content: Thaus Xa‑u tuag hov, Tavi moog tua cov Amalej rov lug hab su huv lub moos Xilaj tau ob nub.
Nub kws peb txawm muaj ib tug yawm tuaj huv Xa‑u lub yeej tuaj rwg tsho nduag taag hab muaj moov aav sau taubhau. Thaus nwg tuaj txug Tavi nwg khwb ti nkaus aav pe.
Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Koj tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv dim huv cov Yixayee lub yeej tuaj.”

Tavi nug nwg tas, “Qha rua kuv saib, xwm txheej zoo le caag?” Nwg teb tas, “Cov tuabneeg tswv huv tshaav rog taag lawm, muaj tuabneeg raug tua tuag coob kawg. Xa‑u hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaa kuj tuag lawm.”
Tavi txawm has rua tug tub hluas kws xaa xuv hov tas, “Koj paub le caag tas Xa‑u hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaa tuag lawm?”
Tug tub hluas kws xaa xuv hov teb tas, “Kuv ca le moog txug sau lub roob Kinpau‑a na cav Xa‑u chob quas nreeg nwg raab muv, hab luas tej tsheb ua rog hab tej tub rog caij neeg tuaj yuav txug nwg.
Thaus nwg tig lug pum kuv nwg txawm hu kuv. Kuv teb tas, ‘Kuv nyob ntawm nuav 'os.’
Nwg nug kuv tas, ‘Koj yog leejtwg?’ Kuv teb tas, ‘Kuv yog tuabneeg Amalej.’
Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Ca le lug sawv ze hab muab kuv tua. Kuv mob qhuav sab kawg kuas kuv txujsa tsw tau tu.’

Kuv txhad txaav moog ze muab nwg tua tseg, tsua qhov kuv yeej paub tseeb tas nwg tub qaug lawm nwg yuav tsw caj le. Kuv txhad hle nwg lub mom vaajntxwv sau nwg taubhau hab nwg le paug teg ntawm txhais npaab, kuv coj tuaj ntawm nuav muab rua koj kws yog kuv tug tswv.”
Tavi txawm dua rhe nwg lub tsho hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg kuj dua pis rhe tsho ib yaam le ntawd.
Puab quaj ntsuag hab yoo mov moog txug tsaus ntuj rua Xa‑u hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaa hab cov Yixayee vem yog puab raug nav ntaaj tuag taag.
Mas Tavi has rua tug hluas kws tuaj has rua nwg hov tas, “Koj tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog lwm haiv tuabneeg le tub, yog tuabneeg Amalej.”
Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Ua caag koj tsw ntshai qhov kws tsaa teg tua tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca lawd?”
Tes Tavi txawm hu ib tug hluas lug hab has tas, “Ca le moog muab nwg tua pov tseg.” Tes nwg txawm muab tug yawm hov tua pov tseg.
Tavi has rua tug yawm hov tas, “Qhov kws koj tuag kod, koj rws koj cov ntshaav, tsua qhov koj lub qhov ncauj ua timkhawv tum koj has tas, ‘Kuv tau tua tug kws Yawmsaub laub roj tsaa ca lawd.’ ”
Tavi kuj quaj ntsuag txug Xa‑u hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaa lawv le nuav.
Nwg has kuas qha zaaj quaj ntsuag nuav rua cov Yuta. Mas zaaj quaj ntsuag nuav  kuj muab sau ca rua huv phoo ntawv Yasa lawm. Tavi has tas,
Yixayee 'e, mej lub koob meej raug muab tua pov tseg rua sau lub roob sab lawm. Tej txwvneej kws sab tuab qaug tuag taag lawm lauj!

Tsw xob pav zaaj nuav rua huv lub moos Ka, tsw xob tshaaj tawm rua huv lub moos Akheloo tej kev, ntshai tsaam Filixatee tej ntxhais yuav zoo sab, hab cov kws tsw ua kevcai txav tej ntxhais yuav zoo sab xyiv faab.

Kinpau‑a tej roob 'e, thov tsw xob muaj lwg muaj naag rua sau mej, hab tsw xob ca tej teb tau qoob loos rua mej, tsua qhov tug kws sab tuab daim phaj hlau qas puag tsuas rua hov ntawd lawm, yog Xa‑u daim phaj hlau kws tsw muaj roj pleev dua le lawm.
Yaunathaa raab neev tsw tig ntawm tej ntshaav kws sws tua hlo le, tsw tig ntawm cov kws sab luj sab tuab tej nqaj, hab Xa‑u raab ntaaj kuj tsw rov lug do.
Xa‑u hab Yaunathaa, kws ntxwm hlub hab zoo kawg le, txawm yog nyob hab tuag los tsw sws ncaim, ob tug nrawm dua tej daav, muaj zug dua le tej tsuv ntxhuav.
Yixayee cov ntxhais 'e, ca le quaj Xa‑u, yog tug kws muab tsoog tsho zoo nkauj yimlaaj rua mej naav, hab muab tej npauj kub teem rua mej tej tsoog tsho.
Cov kws sab luj sab tuab qaug tuag rua huv tshaav rog lawm lauj! Yaunathaa kuj pw tuag rua sau mej lub roob sab.
Kuv tijlaug Yaunathaa 'e, kuv ntxhuv sab kawg txug koj. Koj ua rua kuv kaaj sab kawg. Qhov kws koj hlub kuv zoo tshaaj plawg, zoo dua tej quaspuj kev hlub.
Cov kws sab luj sab tuab qaug tuag lawm lauj! Tej cuab yeej ua rog puam tsuaj taag lawm lauj!

Dhau hov Tavi nug Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yuav nce moog rua huv Yuta tej moos ib lub twg los tsw moog?” Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, “Ca le nce moog.” Tavi txhad has tas, “Kuv yuav moog rua lub twg?” Yawmsaub has tas, “Moog rua lub moos Heploo.”
Tavi txhad nce moog hov ntawd hab nwg ob tug quaspuj kuj nrug nwg moog, yog Ahinau‑aa kws yog tuabneeg Yile‑ee hab Anpikayi kws yog Nanpaa huv Khamee tug quaspuj kws ua puj ntsuag lawm.
Tavi kuj coj cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg ua ke moog hab. Txhua tug kuj nyag coj nyag tsev tuabneeg moog mas puab nyob huv tej zej zog ntawm Heploo.
Cov tuabneeg Yuta tuaj ua ke mas tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav xeem Yuta rua hov ntawd. Thaus muaj tuabneeg has rua Tavi tas, “Cov tuabneeg huv Yanpe Kile‑a yog cov kws log Xa‑u,”
mas Tavi khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua cov tuabneeg Yanpe Kile‑a tas, “Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua mej tsua qhov mej tau ua zoo ua ncaaj ua nceeg rua Xa‑u kws yog mej tug tswv es mej muab nwg log.
Mas thov Yawmsaub ua nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab nwg txujkev ncaaj tshwm rua mej. Hab kuv yuav ua zoo rua mej vem yog mej yog cov kws log Xa‑u.
Vem le nuav mej txhais teg ca le muaj zug, ca le ua sab luj sab tuab, tsua qhov mej tug tswv Xa‑u tub tuag lawm, mas xeem Yuta tub tsaa kuv ua vaajntxwv kaav puab lawm.”
Mas Naw tug tub Anaw kws yog Xa‑u tug thawj kaav tub rog tau coj Xa‑u tug tub Inpause hlaa moog rua lub moos Mahana‑i,
hab tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav Kile‑a hab cov Asu hab Yile‑ee hab Efa‑i hab Npeeyamee hab Yixayee huvsw.
Thaus Xa‑u tug tub Inpause chiv kaav cov Yixayee nwg noob nyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo. Nwg kaav tau ob xyoos tassws xeem Yuta nrug nraim Tavi.
Tavi nyob huv lub moos Heploo ua vaajntxwv kaav xeem Yuta tau xyaa xyoo hab rau lub hli.
Naw tug tub Anaw hab Xa‑u tug tub Inpause cov tub teg tub taw tawm huv Mahana‑i moog rua lub moos Kinpe‑oo.
Hab Xeluya  tug tub Yau‑a hab Tavi cov tub teg tub taw kuj tawm moog ntswb puab ntawm lub paag dej huv lub moos Kinpe‑oo. Puab nyob tsawg ntawm ntug paag dej, ib paab nyob ib saab paag dej.
Anaw has rua Yau‑a tas, “Ca cov hluas ob tog sawv sws ntaus rua peb saib.” Yau‑a has tas, “Kuas puab sawv lug maj.”
Cov Npeeyamee kws yog Xa‑u tug tub Inpause tog kaum ob leeg, hab Tavi tog kaum ob leeg puab sawv lug sws ntaus.
Nyag taug nyag ntsab nkaus taubhau hab xuas ntaaj nyag nkaug nyag tug phob taav mas ob tog tuag taag huvsw le. Puab txhad hu lub chaw hov hu ua Heekha Haxuli  kws nyob ntawm Kinpe‑oo.
Kev ua rog nub hov txhad heev kawg le. Anaw hab cov tuabneeg Yixayee kuj swb Tavi cov tub rog.
Xeluya peb tug tub kuj nyob ntawd, yog Yau‑a, Anpisai hab Axahee. Axahee mas dha nrawm cuag nkaus kauv seb.
Axahee lawv Anaw qaab, nwg lawv nwg qaab tsw tig rua saab xws saab phem le.
Anaw tig lug saib mas has tas, “Koj yog Axahee lov?” Axahee teb tas, “Yog los maj.”
Anaw has rua nwg tas, “Tig rua saab xws lossws saab phem moog nteg ib tug hluas es txeeb nwg hov txhua chaw moog.” Tassws Axahee tsw thim le, nwg ywj lawv Anaw qaab xwb.
Anaw txhad has dua rua Axahee tas, “Ca le tseg tsw xob lawv kuv. Yuav ca kuv ntaus koj kuas qaug huv peg teb ua daabtsw? Tes kuv yuav ua le caag tsaa muag saib tau koj tug tijlaug Yau‑a?”

Tassws nwg tsw yeem tseg qhov kws lawv Anaw. Vem le hov Anaw txhad xuas qaab muv nkaug rov tom qaab txhad chob nplho Axahee lub plaab tshaab plawg nraus qaum, nwg txhad qaug tuag rua hov ntawd. Mas txhua tug kws tuaj rua ntawm lub chaw kws Axahee qaug tuag hov txawm nreg tuabywv rua hov.
Tassws Yau‑a hab Anpisai tseed lawv Anaw qaab moog. Thaus nub poob qho puab moog txug ntawm lub pov roob Aama kws nyob ncaaj ntawm Kiya ntawm txujkev kws moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua Kinpe‑oo.
Cov Npeeyamee sau zog tuaj tom Anaw qaab moog ua hlo ib paab tiv rua sau ib lub ncov roob.

Anaw qw nrov rua Yau‑a tas, “Yuav ca nav ntaaj noj tuabneeg moog le lov? Koj tsw paub tas thaus kawg yuav ab sab nua lov? Yuav ntev le caag es koj le has koj cov tuabneeg tseg tsw lawv puab cov kwvtij?”
Yau‑a txhad has tas, “Muaj Vaajtswv muaj txujsa nyob pum, yog koj tsw cheem mas yuav yog pigkig kaaj ntug cov tub rog le tseg tsw lawv puab kwvtij.”
Yau‑a txhad tshuab raaj kub yaaj, cov tuabneeg suavdawg txhad tseg tsw lawv cov Yixayee hab tsw ua rog dua le lawm.
Mas mo hov Anaw hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhad moog ib mos kev huv Alanpa. Puab hlaa tug dej Yalatee hab hlaa lub haav Npiloo  le moog txug Mahana‑i.
Yau‑a txhad thim tsw lawv Anaw. Mas thaus nwg txheeb cov tuabneeg suavdawg lug ua ke, Tavi cov tub rog pluj lawm kaum cuaj leeg tsw suav Axahee.
Tassws Tavi cov tub rog tua cov Npeeyamee tuag lawm peb puas rau caum leej kws yog Anaw cov tuabneeg.
Puab kwv Axahee moog log rua huv nwg txwv lub qhov ntxaa huv lub moos Npelehee. Yau‑a hab nwg cov tuabneeg moog ib mos kev mas thaus kaaj ntug puab txhad moog txug lub moos Heploo.
Xa‑u cov tuabneeg hab Tavi cov tuabneeg kuj ua rog ntev loo. Tavi kuj kov yeej zuj quas zug, Xa‑u cov kuj ntaug zug zuj quas zug.
Tavi cov tub kws yug huv Heploo yog le nuav, tug tub hlub yog Aanoo, yog Ahinau‑aa kws yog tuabneeg Yile‑ee yug.
Tug ob yog Khile‑a, yog Anpikayi kws yog Nanpaa huv Khamee tug quaspuj kws ua puj ntsuag yug. Tug peb yog Axaloo, yog Ma‑akha kws yog cov Kesu tug vaajntxwv Thaamai tug ntxhais yug.
Tug plaub yog Antauniya, yog Hakis yug. Tug tswb yog Sefathiya, yog Anpithaa yug.
Tug rau yog Ile‑aa, yog Elag kws yog Tavi tug quaspuj yug. Cov tub nuav Tavi yug huv lub moos Heploo.
Lub swjhawm kws Xa‑u cov tuabneeg hab Tavi cov tuabneeg saamswm ua rog, Anaw kuj tsaab ua luj quas zug rua huv Xa‑u cov tuabneeg.
Xa‑u muaj ib tug hluas nkauj hu ua Lixapa, yog Aiyag tug ntxhais. Inpause txawm has rua Anaw tas, “Ua caag koj moog nrug kuv txwv le hluas nkauj pw?”

Mas Anaw chim heev rua Inpause lu lug hov, nwg txawm has tas, “Kuv yog Yuta le ib lub taubhau dev lov?  Naj nub nwgnuav kuv lub sab npuab koj txwv Xa‑u cov tuabneeg hab koj txwv kwvtij kwvluag, kuv tsw tau muab koj rua huv Tavi txhais teg. Tassws nub nua koj tseed yuav xeeb plaub ntawm tug quaspuj nuav rua kuv.
Yog kuv tseed tsw paab Tavi kuas tav lawv le Yawmsaub cog lug rua nwg lawd, kuv thov Vaajtswv rau txem rua kuv kuas nyaav kawg.
Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws rhu huv Xa‑u cov tuabneeg hab kuv yuav tsaa Tavi lub zwm txwv rua sau cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta txwj nrho Ntaaj moog txug ncua Npe‑awsenpa.”
Mas Inpause teb tsw taug Anaw ib lus le tsua qhov nwg ntshai Anaw.

Anaw tso tuabneeg xaa xuv moog has rua Tavi ntawm Heploo tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav yog leejtwg le? Koj nrug kuv cog lug sws raug zoo, mas kuv yuav tuaj koj tog, kuv yuav coj cov Yixayee huvsw lug cob rua koj.”

Tavi has tas, “Zoo kawg. Kuv yuav nrug koj cog lug. Kuv xaav kuas koj ua ib yaam tsaiv. Thaus koj yuav tuaj ntswb kuv tim ntsej tim muag, yog koj tsw coj Xa‑u tug ntxhais Mikhaa tuaj rua kuv tsaiv, mas koj yeej yuav tsw pum kuv.”
Hab Tavi tso xuv rua Xa‑u tug tub Inpause has tas, “Muab kuv tug quaspuj Mikhaa rua kuv, nwg yog tug kws kuv muab cov Filixatee ib puas daim tawv chaw xws qhab lawm.”
Inpause txawm kuas tuabneeg moog coj Mikhaa ntawm nwg tug quasyawg kws yog La‑i tug tub Pati‑ee lug.
Nwg tug quasyawg kuj quaj lawv quaj lawv nwg moog txug ntawm Npahuli. Mas Anaw has rua nwg tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog.” Nwg txhad rov qaab moog lawm.
Anaw txawm nrug Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug sablaaj has tas, “Ntev lug lawm mej yeej xaav kuas Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav mej.

Mas nwgnuav ca le ua kuas tav, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub cog lug ca rua Tavi lawm tas, ‘Kuv yuav swv kuv tug qhev Tavi txhais teg cawm kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee dim huv cov Filixatee txhais teg hab dim huv puab cov yeeb ncuab suavdawg txhais teg huvsw.’ ”
Anaw kuj has rua cov Npeeyamee hab. Anaw txawm moog cuag Tavi huv lub moos Heploo qha txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee hab xeem Npeeyamee suavdawg pum zoo ua.
Thaus Anaw nrug neeg nkaum leej tuaj cuag Tavi huv lub moos Heploo, mas Tavi paam noj haus rua Anaw hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg tuaj.

Anaw has rua Tavi tas, “Kuv yuav sawv kev rov moog hab kuv yuav sau zog cov Yixayee suavdawg tuaj cuag vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, sub puab txhad tau nrug koj cog lug sws raug zoo hab koj txhad yuav kaav tau txhua yaam kws koj sab nyam.” Tavi txhad tso Anaw rov qaab. Anaw rov qaab moog ua tso sab plhuav.

Lub swjhawm hov Yau‑a hab Tavi cov tub rog moog lws luas hab coj hov txhua chaw ntau kawg le lug. Tassws Anaw tub tsw nrug Tavi nyob ntawm Heploo lawm tsua qhov Tavi tub tso nwg moog hab nwg tub moog ua tso sab plhuav lawm.

Thaus Yau‑a hab cov tub rog suavdawg kws nrug nwg lug txug, muaj tuabneeg has rua Yau‑a tas, “Naw tug tub Anaw tuaj cuag vaajntxwv mas vaajntxwv tub tso nwg rov qaab moog lawm, nwg moog ua tso sab plhuav.”
Tes Yau‑a txawm moog has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav? Koj swm saib, Anaw tub tuaj cuag koj. Ua caag koj ca le tso nwg moog, nwg txhad moog lawm?
Koj yeej paub tas Naw tug tub Anaw tuaj daag koj sub txhad paub tas koj tawm moog hab nkaag lug le caag hab paub txhua yaam kws koj ua.”
Thaus Yau‑a tawm ntawm Tavi lug nwg txawm tso tuabneeg xaa xuv moog caum Anaw. Puab coj Anaw ntawm lub paag dej Xilas rov lug. Tavi kuj tsw paub qhov nuav le.

Thaus Anaw rov lug txug Heploo lawm Yau‑a txawm coj nwg tuab leeg nkaag moog rua huv plawv rooj loog sub txhad tau nrug nwg tuab leeg thaam xwb. Tes Yau‑a txawm nkaug Anaw plaab hov ntawd, Anaw txhad tuag lawm, tub yog Yau‑a pauj taub qhov kws nwg tug kwv Axahee tuag.
Dhau hov thaus Tavi paub le hov nwg txhad has tas, “Kuv hab kuv lub tebchaws yuav tsw rws lub txem kws Naw tug tub Anaw cov ntshaav lug nuav ib txhws taab meeg Yawmsaub xubndag.

Thov kuas lub txem poob rua sau Yau‑a taubhau hab poob rua sau nwg txwv caaj ceg. Ca Yau‑a caaj ceg pheej yuav muaj tug kws muaj kua ndwg lug lossws muaj tug kws mob lis mob ruas lossws muaj tug kws nreg paas  lossws muaj tug kws raug nav ntaaj tua lossws muaj tug kws tsw muaj mov noj.”
Yau‑a hab nwg tug kwv Anpisai tua Anaw vem Anaw tau tua ob tug tug kwv Axahee rua ntawm tshaav rog Kinpe‑oo lawm.

Tavi kuj has rua Yau‑a hab cov tuabneeg suavdawg kws nrug nwg tas, “Ca le dua mej tej rwg tsho hab muab khaub seev tsaaj lug npua hab quaj ntsuag moog ua Anaw lub cev tuag ntej.” Hab vaajntxwv Tavi lawv qaab lub hleb.
Puab muab Anaw log rua ntawm Heploo. Vaajntxwv kuj tsaa suab quaj ntawm Anaw lub ntxaa hab cov pejxeem suavdawg kuj quaj kawg le.
Vaajntxwv quaj ntsuag txug Anaw tas, “Tswm nyog Anaw yuav tuag ib yaam nkaus le tug tuabneeg ruag lov?

Tub tsw muab koj txhais teg khi, tub tsw muab koj kwtaw ntsug phoo, koj ca le qaug tuag yaam nkaus le tuabneeg qaug rua ntawm tuabneeg limham xubndag.” Mas cov pejxeem suavdawg kuj rov quaj Anaw dua ib zag.

Cov pejxeem suavdawg tuaj cheem kuas Tavi noj mov rua thaus tseed nruab nub. Tassws Tavi twv has tas, “Yog kuv swm mivntswv ncuav lossws ib yaam daabtsw ua ntej kws nub poob qho, mas ca Vaajtswv rau txem rua kuv le ntawd nyaav dua hab.”
Cov pejxeem suavdawg pum le hov mas kuj txaus sab. Txhua yaam kws vaajntxwv ua yeej los txaus cov pejxeem lub sab.
Nub hov cov pejxeem suavdawg hab cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj nkaag sab tas tsw yog vaajntxwv muaj nplooj sab tua Naw tug tub Anaw.
Vaajntxwv has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Mej tsw paub lov, nub nua cov Yixayee ib tug thawj tseem ceeb tau tuag lawm?
Txawm yog kuv raug tsaa ua vaajntxwv los nub nua kuv kuj qaug zug. Xeluya cov tub nuav nyaav dhau rua kuv lawm. Thov Yawmsaub pauj taub rua tug kws ua txhum lawv le nwg kev txhum.”
Thaus Xa‑u tug tub Inpause nov tas Anaw tuag rua huv Heploo lawm nwg ntaug zug hlo lawm hab cov Yixayee suavdawg poob sab taag.

Xa‑u tug tub muaj ob yawm ua thawj coj paab tub rog lws luas, ib tug hu ua Npa‑anas, ib tug hu ua Lekhaj. Ob tug yog Limoo le tub kws yog xeem Npeeyamee nyob huv lub moos Npe‑awlau (tsua qhov kuj muab Npe‑awlau suav ua Npeeyamee le moos.
Cov tuabneeg huv Npe‑awlau tswv moog rua lub moos Kitha‑i mas nyob hov ntawd lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.)

Xa‑u tug tub Yaunathaa muaj ib tug tub moog tsw taug kev. Thaus kws muaj xuv xwm has txug Xa‑u hab Yaunathaa huv Yile‑ee tuaj, tug mivnyuas nuav muaj tswb xyoos. Mas tug nkauj qhev kws tu nwg muab puag coj tswv. Thaus nwg maaj tswv moog hov, tug mivnyuas txawm poob mas tuag ceg. Nwg npe hu ua Mefinpause.
Mas Limoo kws yog tuabneeg Npe‑awlau ob tug tub kws yog Lekhaj hab Npa‑anas txawm sawv kev moog. Thaus tshaav ntuj kub puab tuaj txug Inpause lub tsev, yog thaus taav su kws Inpause tseed pw su.
Tes ob tug txawm nkaag moog rua huv tsev ua txuj yaam le yuav moog nqaa mivntswv mog tes ob tug txawm nkaug kag Inpause plaab, tes Lekhaj hab nwg tijlaug Npa‑anas txawm tswv lawm.

Thaus ob tug nkaag moog rua huv tsev Inpause pw huv txaaj, mas ob tug txawm ntaus nwg hab muab nwg tua hab txav nwg lub taubhau. Ob tug coj nwg lub taubhau taug txujkev huv Alanpa moog ib mos kaaj ntug.

Ob tug coj Inpause lub taubhau moog pub rua Tavi huv lub moos Heploo hab has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Nuav yog koj tug yeeb ncuab Xa‑u tug tub Inpause lub taubhau, yog tug kws nrhav txuv koj txujsa. Nub nua Yawmsaub tau paab vaajntxwv kws yog ib ob leeg tug tswv pauj taub rua Xa‑u hab nwg tej tub ki.”

Tassws Tavi teb Lekhaj hab nwg tug tijlaug Npa‑anas kws yog Limoo kws yog tuabneeg huv Npe‑awlau ob tug tub tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub muaj txujsa nyob pum, yog tug kws cawm kuv dim huv txhua txujkev txom nyem,

thaus muaj ib tug has rua kuv tas, ‘Xa‑u tuag lawm,’ nwg xaav tas yog nwg coj xuv zoo rua kuv, kuv muab nwg nteg muab nwg tua rua ntawm Xilaj lawm. Nuav yog kuv muab nqe zug rua nwg tsua qhov kws nwg coj tsaab xuv hov tuaj.

Heev dua le hov, yog muaj tuabneeg phem tua tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg rua huv nwg lub tsev hab sau nwg lub txaaj pw, kuv yuav tsw kuas meb rws nwg cov ntshaav nua lov, hab yuav tsw muab meb ua puam tsuaj huv nplajteb nuav lov?”

Tavi txawm has rua nwg cov tub hluas, mas puab muab ob tug tua, muab txav teg txav taw muab ob lub cev dai rua ntawm ntug paag dej ntawm Heploo. Tassws puab muab Inpause lub taubhau coj moog log rua huv Anaw lub qhov ntxaa ntawm lub moos Heploo.
Cov Yixayee txhua xeem tuaj cuag Tavi huv lub moos Heploo hab has tas, “Peb nrug koj koom nqaj koom txhaa.

Thau u kws Xa‑u ua vaajntxwv kaav peb, koj yeej yog tug kws coj cov Yixayee tawm moog hab coj rov qaab lug, hab Yawmsaub has rua koj tas, ‘Koj yuav ua tug yug yaaj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee hab koj yuav ua cov Yixayee tug thawj.’ ”

Yog le hov Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg txhad tuaj cuag Tavi huv lub moos Heploo. Hab vaajntxwv Tavi nrug puab sws cog lug huv lub moos Heploo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, tes puab txawm laub roj tsaa Tavi ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee.
Thaus Tavi chiv kaav tebchaws nwg noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo hab nwg kaav tau plaub caug xyoo.
Nwg nyob huv Heploo kaav cov Yuta tau xyaa xyoo rau lub hli, hab nyob huv Yeluxalee kaav cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta huvsw tau peb caug peb xyoos.

Vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tub rog moog rua lub nroog Yeluxalee ua rog rua cov Yenpu kws nyob huv lub tebchaws hov. Cov Yenpu has rua Tavi tas, “Koj txeem tsw tau lug rua huv nuav, cov tuabneeg dig muag ceg tawv kuj yuav tiv tau koj.” Puab xaav tas Tavi yuav txeem lug tsw tau le.
Txawm le ntawd los Tavi txeeb tau lub chaw ruaj khov Xi‑oo, kws yog Tavi lub nroog.

Nub ntawd Tavi has tas, “Leejtwg yuav moog ntaus cov Yenpu ca tug hov nce taug tug kwj deg moog tua cov dig muag ceg tawv kws Tavi lub sab ntxub kawg le.” Vem le hov luas txhad has tas, “Tsw xob kheev cov dig muag ceg tawv nkaag lug rua huv vaajntxwv tsev.”
Tavi nyob hlo huv lub chaw ruaj khov hab hu lub chaw hov tas Tavi lub nroog. Hab Tavi tswm lub nroog puag ncig txwj ntawm lub loog Milau moog rua saab huv.
Tavi muaj fwjchim zuj zug vem yog Yawmsaub kws yog Vaajtswv muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus nrug nraim nwg.
Vaajntxwv Hilaa huv lub nroog Thailab tso tuabneeg xaa xuv tuaj cuag Tavi hab xaa ntoo cab hab cov Kws ntoo cov Kws txhwm pob zeb tuaj ua lub tsev rua Tavi nyob.
Tavi paub tas Yawmsaub tau tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv ruaj khov kaav cov Yixayee hab ua rua nwg lub tebchaws vaam meej vem yog saib rua nwg haiv tuabneeg Yixayee.
Thaus Tavi tawm huv lub moos Heploo lug nyob rua huv Yeluxalee nwg yuav dua nam yau hab coj tej hluas nkauj lug kaav, mas yug dua tub hab ntxhais.
Cov mivnyuas kws Tavi yug huv Yeluxalee le npe yog le nuav: Samu‑a, Saunpam, Nathaa, Xalaumoo,
Iha, Elisu‑a, Nefe, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliyanta hab Elifele.

Thaus cov Filixatee nov tas Tavi raug tsaa ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee huvsw, cov Filixatee suavdawg txawm nce tuaj nrhav Tavi. Tassws Tavi nov le hov nwg txawm moog nyob rua huv lub chaw ruaj khov.
Cov Filixatee tuaj nyob thoob plawg huv lub haav Lefa‑i.

Tavi txawm ua nug rua Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv yuav moog ntaus cov Filixatee lov? Koj yuav muab puab rua huv kuv txhais teg los tsw muab?” Yawmsaub teb Tavi tas, “Ca le moog, kuv yeej yuav muab cov Filixatee rua huv koj txhais teg.”

Tavi txhad moog rua ntawm lub moos Npa‑aa Pelaxi, mas Tavi kov yeej cov Filixatee hov ntawd. Nwg has tas, “Yawmsaub txeem plawg rua kuv cov yeeb ncuab yaam le dej txeem plawg moog nyaab.” Vem le hov lub chaw hov txhad hu ua Npa‑aa Pelaxi.
Cov Filixatee txhad muab puab tej txoov daab tso tseg rua hov ntawd. Tavi hab nwg cov tub rog txhad muab nqaa moog lawm.
Cov Filixatee rov qaab tuaj dua moog nyob thoob plawg huv lub haav Lefa‑i.
Thaus Tavi rov qaab ua nug rua Yawmsaub dua ib zag, Yawmsaub has tas, “Koj tsw xob ncaaj moog, ca le zos moog tom puab qub qaab, ntaus puab ncaaj ntawm cov ntoo zaub kaab.

Thaus koj nov suab nrov sau cov ntsws ntoo zaub kaab yaam le lub suab kws tub rog moog kev, koj ca le maaj nroog moog, vem lub swjhawm ntawd Yawmsaub tau ua koj ntej moog ntaus Filixatee cov tub rog lawm.”
Tavi ua lawv le Yawmsaub has rua nwg mas ntaus cov Filixatee txwj ntawm lub moos Kenpa moog txug ncua lub moos Kexaw.
Tavi rov txhwj peb vaam leej tub rog kws nwg xaiv huv cov Yixayee ca lawd.

Hab Tavi nrug nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg sawv kev moog rua ntawm lub moos Npa‑aleyuta moog coj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab kws hu lawv le Yawmsaub tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub npe kws nyob lub zwm txwv sau cov Khelunpee lug.
Puab kuj muab ib lub tsheb nyuj tshab thauj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab hab coj tawm huv Anpinanta lub tsev kws nyob sau lub roob lug. Uxa hab Ahiyau kws yog Anpinanta le tub tsaav lub tsheb nyuj tshab hov
kws muaj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab, mas Ahiyau moog ua lub swb xaab ntej.

Tavi hab cov Yixayee suavdawg kuj zoo sab xyiv faab rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag kawg puab tug daag tug zug, hab hu nkauj ntaus nkauj nog ncaas miv hab nkauj nog ncaas luj hab cu tswb khob paab hab npuaj nruag tooj lab.
Thaus puab lug txug ntawm Nakhoo lub tshaav ntaus qoob Uxa cev teg tuav nkaus Vaajtswv lub swb xaab tsua qhov nyuj dawm.
Mas Yawmsaub txhad npau tawg rua Uxa. Mas Vaajtswv ntaus nwg tuag vem yog nwg cev teg tuav lub swb xaab, tes nwg txawm tuag rua ntawm Vaajtswv lub swb xaab ib saab.
Tavi chim tsua qhov kws Yawmsaub txujkev npau tawg tshwm plawg lug rua Uxa, vem le ntawd txhad hu lub chaw hov hu ua Pele‑uxa  lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Nub ntawd Tavi kuj ntshai Yawmsaub heev hab nwg has tas, “Yawmsaub lub swb xaab yuav lug nrug kuv nyob tau le caag?”
Tavi txhad tsw kaam coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab moog rua huv Tavi lub nroog, tassws nwg coj moog ca rua tom Aunpe Entoo kws yog tuabneeg Ka lub tsev.
Yawmsaub lub swb xaab nyob huv Aunpe Entoo kws yog tuabneeg Ka lub tsev tau peb lub hlis, mas Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua Aunpe Entoo hab nwg tsev tuabneeg suavdawg.

Muaj tuabneeg has rua vaajntxwv Tavi tas, “Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua Aunpe Entoo tsev tuabneeg hab txhua yaam kws yog nwg le, vem yog muaj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab.” Yog le hov Tavi txhad moog coj Vaajtswv lub swb xaab ntawm Aunpe Entoo tsev lug rua huv Tavi lub nroog xyiv faab hlo.
Thaus cov kws kwv Yawmsaub lub swb xaab moog tau rau kauj ruam, Tavi kuj tua ib tug nyuj hab ib tug thaav nyuj rog rog xyeem.
Tavi kuj dha seev cev kawg nwg tug daag tug zug rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag. Hab Tavi naav lub tsho efauj  xwb.
Yog le nuav Tavi hab ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg txhad qw zoo sab xyiv faab tshuab raaj kub yaaj coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab lug.

Thaus Yawmsaub lub swb xaab lug rua huv Tavi lub nroog, Xa‑u tug ntxhais Mikhaa xauj qhov rais pum vaajntxwv Tavi dha paaj pawg quas ntsog seev cev rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag, tes nwg txawm xob sab rua Tavi.

Puab coj Yawmsaub lub swb xaab lug txawb rua lub chaw huv lub tsev ntaub kws Tavi tub tsaa ca lawd, hab Tavi kuj tua tsaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.
Thaus Tavi ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo taag lawd, nwg txawm tuav Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub npe foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem.
Hab nwg muab ib leeg ib lub ncuav, ib leeg ib daim nqaj hab ib lub ncuav txwv maab qhuav pub rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tsw has quaspuj quasyawg. Tes puab txawm nyag rov moog nyag tsev.

Tavi kuj rov moog foom koob moov rua nwg tsev tuabneeg. Tassws Mikhaa kws yog Xa‑u tug ntxhais tawm tuaj tog Tavi hab has tas, “Nub nua cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv tau koob meej luj kawg le lauj! Nwg hle tej tsoog vaajntxwv taab meeg nwg cov tub teg tub taw tej nkauj qhev yaam nkaus le tej tuabneeg plhu tuab hle rwg tsho tsw paub txaaj muag le.”

Mas Tavi has rua Mikhaa tas, “Kuv ua le nuav fwm Yawmsaub kws xaiv kuv lug nyob koj txwv chaw hab nyob nwg caaj ceg suavdawg chaw tsaa kuv ua thawj kaav cov Yixayee kws yog Yawmsaub haiv tuabneeg, mas kuv txhad ua lomzem zoo sab xyiv faab rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag.
Kuv yuav txu kuas kuv raug saib tsw taug heev dua le nuav hab kuv yuav saib kuv qeg dua hab. Tassws cov nkauj qhev kws koj has ntawd, puab yuav muab kuv saib hlub.”
Tes Xa‑u tug ntxhais Mikhaa txawm tsw muaj mivnyuas taag swm neej le.
Thaus vaajntxwv nyob ruaj huv nwg lub vaaj tse, hab Yawmsaub ua rua nwg cov yeeb ncuab kws nyob ib ncig tsw tuaj ua rog rua nwg lawm,
vaajntxwv has rua Nathaa kws ua xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tas, “Saib maj, kuv nyob huv lub tsev kws xuas ntoo cab ua huas Vaajtswv lub swb xaab nyob huv lub tsev ntaub xwb.”
Mas Nathaa has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Koj ca le moog ua txhua yaam kws koj lub sab xaav ua, tsua qhov Yawmsaub nrug nraim koj.”
Tassws mo ntawd Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua Nathaa tas,
“Ca le moog has rua kuv tug qhev Tavi tas, ‘Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Koj yuav ua ib lub tsev rua kuv nyob lov?
Txwj thaus kuv coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug txug nub nua, kuv tsw txeev nyob huv lub tsev, tassws kuv moog moog lug lug nyob huv lub tsev ntaub xwb.

Txhua qhov kws kuv nrug cov Yixayee suavdawg moog moog lug lug, kuv puas tau has ib lu lug rua cov Yixayee ib tug thawj twg kws kuv khaiv kuas saib kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee has tas, “Ua caag mej tsw ua ib lub tsev ntoo cab rua kuv?” ’

Vem le nuav nwgnuav koj ca le has rua kuv tug qhev Tavi tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus has le nuav tas, Kuv coj koj tawm huv lub tshaav zaub kws koj yug yaaj lug ua tug thawj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee.

Koj moog hovtwg los kuv nrug nraim koj qhov ntawd, hab kuv rhuav tshem koj cov yeeb ncuab huvsw ntawm koj lub xubndag moog. Kuv yuav pub kuas koj muaj koob meej ib yaam le tej kws muaj koob meej luj huv nplajteb nuav.

Kuv yuav tu ib lub chaw ca rua kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee nyob, hab kuv yuav muab puab cog ca nyob ruaj khov rua huv lub chaw kws yog puab tug, tsw muaj leejtwg yuav tuaj zwg puab. Tej tuabneeg limham ndais ntuj yuav tsw tuaj tswm txom puab dua le lawm yaam le yaav taag lug

txwj thaus kuv tsaa cov thawj kaav kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee. Kuv yuav ua rua koj tej yeeb ncuab suavdawg tsw ua rog rua koj lawm. Dua le ntawd Yawmsaub has rua koj tas Yawmsaub yuav pub kuas koj muaj caaj ceg ua vaaj moog le.
Thaus koj noob nyoog taag moog nrug koj tej laug nyob lawd, kuv yuav tsaa ib tug tub kws koj yug lug nyob koj chaw hab kuv yuav tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav ruaj khov.
Nwg yog tug kws yuav ua lub tuam tsev rua kuv lub npe, hab kuv yuav tsaa nwg lub zwm txwv nyob moog ib txhws.
Kuv yuav ua nwg leej txwv hab nwg yuav ua kuv tug tub. Thaus nwg ua txhum kuv yuav swv tuabneeg raab nplawm qhuab qha nwg, hab kuv yuav swv tuabneeg nplawm nwg.
Tassws kuv yuav tsw muab kuv txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rhu ntawm nwg moog yaam le kws kuv tau rhu ntawm Xa‑u kws kuv muab rhuav tshem pluj ntawm koj moog.
Koj caaj ceg hab qhov kws puab ua vaajntxwv yuav nyob ruaj khov rua ntawm kuv xubndag moog ib txhws le. Koj lub zwm txwv yuav raug muab tsaa nyob ruaj khov moog ib txhws.’ ”
Nathaa has tej lug nuav huvsw rua Tavi lawv le tej kws nwg ua yug quas toog.

Tes vaajntxwv Tavi txawm nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub nyob quas tsawg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag mas has tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, kuv yog leejtwg, kuv caaj ceg yog leejtwg es koj coj kuv lug txug txwj nuav?

Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, tej nuav yog tej yaam miv miv ntawm koj lub qhov muag xwb. Koj tseed has tseg txug kuv kws yog koj tug qhev caaj ceg rua ntau xyoo tom hauv ntej. Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub koj tau qha tej nuav rua tuabneeg.
Kuv Tavi yuav has daabtsw ntxwv rua koj hab? Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj yeej paub kuv kws yog koj tug qhev.
Tub yog vem koj saib rua koj tej lug cog tseg hab vem yog lawv le koj lub sab nyam koj txhad ua tej num luj nuav huvsw hab qha rua koj tug qhev paub.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj luj kawg, tsw muaj leejtwg zoo cuag le koj. Dhau koj lawm yeej tsw muaj dua ib tug vaajtswv txwj le peb lub qhov ntsej tau nov.

Haiv tuabneeg twg huv lub nplajteb nuav yuav zoo thooj le koj haiv tuabneeg Yixayee, kws Vaajtswv moog txhwv lug ua nwg haiv tuabneeg hab ua rua nwg lub npe nto moo quas lug? Nwg ua tej yaam kws luj kawg hab txaus ntshai rua lub tebchaws taab meeg puab, yog nwg haiv tuabneeg kws nwg txhwv tawm huv Iyi tebchaws hab huv tej tuabneeg tej daab lug.
Au Yawmsaub, koj tswm tsaa koj haiv tuabneeg Yixayee lug ua koj le teej tug moog ib txhws le, hab koj ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, thov koj tuav tej lug kws koj has txug kuv kws yog koj tug qhev hab has txug kuv caaj ceg nyob ruaj moog ib txhws, hab thov koj ua lawv le koj tau has ca lawd.

Koj lub npe yuav raug qhuas moog ib txhws has tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yog Vaajtswv kws kaav cov Yixayee,’ hab Tavi kws yog koj tug qhev caaj ceg yuav nyob ruaj khov ntawm koj lub xubndag moog le.

Au Yawmsaub kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, koj tub qha rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev paub tas, koj yuav tswm kuv kuas muaj caaj ceg ua vaaj moog le. Vem le nuav kuv kws yog koj tug qhev txhad muaj cuabkaav tsaa ncauj thov koj.
Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj yeej yog Vaajtswv, koj tej lug yeej yog lug tseeb, hab koj tau cog tej lug zoo nuav rua koj tug qhev.

Yog le nuav nwgnuav thov koj txaus sab foom koob moov rua koj tug qhev caaj ceg kuas nyob ruaj rua ntawm koj lub xubndag moog ib txhws. Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj tub has ca le ntawd lawm, hab koj tej koob moov yeej yuav muaj rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev caaj ceg moog ib txhws.”
Dhau hov Tavi ntaus yeej cov Filixatee hab tswjfwm puab. Tavi txeeb tau lub moos Methehama ntawm cov Filixatee txhais teg.

Nwg ntaus yeej cov Mau‑a hab. Nwg yuam puab pw ua ib kaab saab rua huv peg teb mas xuas hlua ntsuag puab, ntsuag ob hluas muab tua pov tseg, ntsuag ib hluas tseg ca. Cov Mau‑a kuj zwm rua Tavi hab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj them se rua nwg.
Tavi kuj ntaus yeej Lehau tug tub Hantantexaw kws ua vaajntxwv huv lub moos Xaunpa, yog thaus Hantantexaw moog txeeb cov tebchaws ntawm dej Yufeti rov qaab.

Tavi txeeb tau cov tub rog caij neeg ib txheeb xyaa pua leej hab cov tub rog moog kwtaw ob vaam leej, hab Tavi txav cov neeg kws hai tsheb ua rog leeg rawg huvsw, tseg kuas txaus hai ib puas lub tsheb ua rog xwb.
Thaus cov tuabneeg Alaa kws nyob huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka tuaj paab Xaunpa tug vaajntxwv Hantantexaw, mas Tavi tua cov Alaa ob vaam ob txheeb leej.
Tavi tsaa ib co tub rog zuv kaav cov Alaa huv lub nroog Ntamaxaka. Cov Alaa zwm rua Tavi hab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj them se rua nwg. Yawmsaub pub Tavi kov yeej rua txhua qhov kws nwg moog.
Hab Tavi txeeb tau daim phaj kub kws thaiv hauv sab kws Hantantexaw cov tub teg tub taw coj, hab coj moog rua lub nroog Yeluxalee.
Hab vaajntxwv Tavi txeeb tau tooj lab ntau ntau le ntawm lub moos Npetha hab lub moos Npelauthai kws yog Hantantexaw tej moos.
Thaus vaajntxwv Thau‑i huv lub moos Hama nov tas Tavi tau ntaus yeej Hantantexaw cov tub rog huvsw lawm,

Thau‑i txawm khaiv nwg tug tub Yaulaa moog cuag vaajntxwv Tavi moog has ib lu lug tshaav ntuj zoo sab rua nwg tsua qhov kws Tavi tau ua rog hab ntaus yeej Hantantexaw lawm, tsua qhov Hantantexaw pheej ua rog rua Thau‑i. Yaulaa kuj coj tej hov txhua chaw kws xuas nyaj xuas kub xuas tooj lab ua, tuaj pub rua Tavi.
Vaajntxwv Tavi muab txhua yaam nuav xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub, hab muab tej nyaj kub kws nwg muab tau ntawm txhua haiv tuabneeg kws nwg kov yeej xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub,
yog tej kws nwg txeeb tau ntawm cov Entoo,  cov Mau‑a, cov Aamoo, cov Filixatee, cov Amalej hab tej kws nwg txeeb tau ntawm Lehau tug tub Hantantexaw kws ua vaajntxwv huv Xaunpa.
Thaus Tavi moog tua cov Entoo  tuag ib vaam yim txheeb leej rua huv lub Haav Ntsev rov lug, tes nwg lub moo txawm nrov nchaa quas lug.
Nwg tso tub rog zuv kaav thoob tebchaws Entoo, mas cov tuabneeg Entoo suavdawg zwm rua Tavi. Yawmsaub pub Tavi kov yeej rua txhua qhov kws nwg moog.
Mas Tavi kaav taag nrho cov Yixayee huvsw. Tavi ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab ua zoo rua nwg cov pejxeem suavdawg.
Xeluya tug tub Yau‑a ua thawj kaav tub rog. Ahilu tug tub Yehausafa ua tug kws sau ntawv keeb kwm.
Ahithu tug tub Xantau hab Anpiyatha tug tub Ahimelej ua pov thawj. Xelaya ua tug tub sau ntawv.
Yehauyanta tug tub Npenaya kaav cov Khelethi hab cov Pelethi.  Hab Tavi cov tub ua pov thawj.
Tavi has tas, “Xa‑u caaj ceg tshuav leejtwg rua kuv hlub vem yog saib rua Yaunathaa los tsw tshuav?”
Xa‑u tsev tuabneeg muaj ib tug tub qhe hu ua Xinpa, tes puab txawm hu nwg tuaj cuag Tavi, mas vaajntxwv Tavi nug nwg tas, “Koj yog Xinpa lov?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv kws yog koj tug qhev yog lauj.”
Vaajntxwv has rua nwg tas, “Xa‑u caaj ceg tshuav leejtwg rua kuv hlub lawv le Vaajtswv txujkev hlub los tsw tshuav?” Xinpa teb vaajntxwv tas, “Yaunathaa tshuav ib tug tub, tuag taw hab.”
Vaajntxwv nug nwg tas, “Tug hov nyob hovtwg?” Xinpa has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Tug hov nyob huv Ami‑ee tug tub Makhi lub tsev huv lub moos Launtenpa.”
Tes vaajntxwv txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog coj tug hov huv Ami‑ee tug tub Makhi lub tsev ntawm lub moos Launtenpa lug.
Tes Yaunathaa tug tub Mefinpause kws yog Xa‑u tug xeeb ntxwv txhad tau lug cuag Tavi, nwg khwb nkaus pe Tavi. Tavi has tas, “Mefinpause 'e.” Nwg teb tas, “Yawm hlub, kuv yog koj tug qhev.”

Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Tsw xob ntshai tsua qhov kuv yuav hlub koj vem yog saib rua koj txwv Yaunathaa, hab kuv yuav muab koj yawm Xa‑u tej laj teb huvsw thim rua koj, hab koj yuav nrug kuv koom noj haus ua ke ntawm kuv rooj mov moog le.”
Mefinpause txawm pe hab has tas, “Kuv kws yog koj tug qhev yog leejtwg es koj yuav tsaa lub laaj muag saib tug dev tuag kws zoo le kuv nuav?”
Vaajntxwv hu Xinpa kws yog Xa‑u tug tub qhe tuaj hab has tas, “Txhua yaam kws yog Xa‑u hab nwg tsev tuabneeg le kuv muab cob rua koj tug tswv tug xeeb ntxwv lawm.

Koj hab koj cov tub ki hab koj cov tub qhe yuav tsum ua nwg tej teb rua nwg, hab sau tej qoob kws ua tau hov lug rua koj tug tswv tug xeeb ntxwv tau noj. Tassws Mefinpause kws yog koj tug tswv tug xeeb ntxwv nuav yuav nrug kuv koom rooj noj ua ke.” Xinpa muaj kaum tswb tug tub hab neeg nkaum tug tub qhe.
Xinpa txawm has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Kuv yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le kws vaajntxwv has rua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev.” Mefinpause txhad nrug Tavi koom rooj noj haus ua ke ib yaam le yog vaajntxwv tub.
Mefinpause muaj ib tug mivtub yau hu ua Mikhas. Txhua tug kws nyob huv Xinpa lub tsev puavleej ua Mefinpause le tub qhe.
Mefinpause txhad nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalee. Nwg nrug vaajntxwv koom ib lub rooj noj mov moog le. Nwg ob txhais taw tuag taag huvsw.
Dhau ntawd lug cov Aamoo tug vaajntxwv txawm tuag mas nwg tug tub Hanu ua vaajntxwv nyob nwg txwv chaw.

Tavi txawm has tas, “Kuv yuav ua ncaaj ua zoo rua Naha tug tub Hanu ib yaam le nwg txwv tau ua ncaaj ua zoo rua kuv.” Tavi txhad tso nwg cov tub teg tub taw moog nplig Hanu sab vem nwg txwv tuag lawm. Mas Tavi cov tub teg tub taw txhad moog rua huv cov Aamoo tebchaws.

Tassws cov Aamoo cov thawj has rua Hanu kws ua puab tug tswv tas, “Koj xaav has tas Tavi xaa tuabneeg tuaj nplig koj tes yog nwg fwm koj txwv nua lov? Sub tsw yog Tavi khaiv nwg cov tub teg tub taw tuaj cuag koj es yuav saib hab tshuaj saib hab rhuav lub nroog.”
Hanu txawm nteg Tavi cov tub teg tub taw hab muab fwj txwv chais ib nraab tseg ib nraab hab muab puab lub tsho txav txwj ntawm lub ntsaag rua yaav huv pov tseg, hab muab puab tso moog.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Tavi paub mas nwg khaiv tuabneeg moog tog puab tsua qhov puab raug kev txaaj muag heev. Vaajntxwv txhad has tas, “Mej ca le su ntawm lub moos Yelikhau moog txug thaus mej cov fwj txwv tuaj tsaiv le maav lug.”

Thaus cov Aamoo pum tas puab ua rua Tavi ntxub puab lawm, cov Aamoo txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog ndav cov tuabneeg Alaa  huv lub moos Npelehau hab cov Alaa huv lub moos Xaunpa, yog tub rog moog kwtaw huvsw ob vaam leej, hab ndav tug vaajntxwv huv Ma‑akha kws muaj ib txheeb leej, hab cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Thauj yog ib vaam ob txheeb leej.
Thaus Tavi nov tej nuav lawd nwg txawm khaiv Yau‑a hab cov tub rog sab tuab huvsw moog.

Cov Aamoo kuj tawm tuaj npaaj tub rog rua ntawm rooj loog. Cov Alaa kws tuaj huv lub moos Xaunpa hab tuaj huv lub moos Lehau, hab cov tuabneeg Thauj hab cov tuabneeg Ma‑akha, puab nyob dua ib caag tom xub tsuag.

Thaus Yau‑a pum tas luas npaaj tub rog rua tom nwg hauv ntej hab npaaj tub rog rua tom nwg qub qaab, nwg txawm xaiv paab tub rog Yixayee kws txawj tshaaj plawg qee leej hab tso puab moog tiv cov Alaa.
Dua le cov nwg muab cob rua nwg tug kwv Anpisai kaav hab kuas puab npaaj moog tiv cov Aamoo.
Yau‑a has tas, “Yog cov Alaa muaj zug heev dhau kuv, koj ca le tuaj paab kuv, huas yog cov Aamoo muaj zug heev dhau koj mas kuv yuav tuaj paab koj.
Ca le ua sab tuab, peb ca le ua sab luj yaam le txwvneej yawg paab peb haiv tuabneeg hab paab peb tug Vaajtswv tej moos. Thov Yawmsaub ua lawv le nwg pum zoo.”
Ua le hov mas Yau‑a hab cov tub rog kws nrug nwg txhad le txeem moog ze ua rog rua cov Alaa, mas cov Alaa txhad tswv thim quas zug tom nwg hauv ntej.

Thaus cov Aamoo pum cov Alaa tswv lawm tes puab txawm tswv ntawm Anpisai hauv ntej ib yaam nkaus nkaag moog rua huv lub nroog. Tes Yau‑a txawm tseg tsw ua rog rua cov Aamoo, ca le rov lug rua Yeluxalee.
Thaus cov Alaa pum tas puab swb cov Yixayee lawm puab txawm moog sau zog lug ua ke.
Mas Hantantexaw khaiv tuabneeg moog coj cov tuabneeg Alaa kws nyob saab dej Yufeti nub tuaj tawm tuaj. Puab tuaj rua ntawm Helaa. Hantantexaw tug thawj rog Saunpa coj puab kev.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg has rua Tavi paub mas nwg sau zog cov Yixayee suavdawg tuaj ua ke hlaa tug dej Yalatee tuaj txug ntawm Helaa. Mas cov Alaa npaaj tub rog tiv Tavi hab ua rog rua nwg.

Cov Alaa kuj thim tswv cov Yixayee mas Tavi tua tau Alaa cov tub rog huv tsheb ua rog tuag xyaa pua leej hab tua tau cov tub rog caij neeg tuag plaub vaam leej hab tua tau puab tug thawj rog Saunpa tuag rua hov ntawd.

Thaus cov vaajntxwv kws zwm rua Hantantexaw pum tas puab swb cov Yixayee lawm puab kuj nrug cov Yixayee sws raug zoo hab zwm rua cov Yixayee. Vem le nuav cov Alaa txhad ntshai tsw kaav paab cov Aamoo dua le lawm.

Thaus txug lub caij ntuj qhua yog lub caij kws tej vaajntxwv pheej tawm moog ua rog, Tavi khaiv Yau‑a hab cov tub teg tub taw hab Yixayee cov tub rog huvsw moog ntaus yeej cov Aamoo hab vej lub nroog Lanpa ca. Tassws Tavi nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalee xwb.

Muaj ib nub thaus yuav tsaus ntuj Tavi sawv ntawm nwg lub chaw pw nce moog rua sau vaajntxwv lub tsev txheej tsev laag tshaav ncig ua sw. Nwg tsaa muag saib pum ib tug quaspuj daa dej, tug quaspuj hov zoo nkauj heev.
Tavi khaiv tuabneeg moog nug txug tug quaspuj hov. Muaj ib tug lug has tas, “Tug quaspuj hov sub tsw yog Npasenpa kws yog Eli‑aa tug ntxhais kws yog Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai tug quaspuj lov?”

Tes Tavi txawm khaiv tub xaa xuv moog coj tug quaspuj hov tuaj. Tug quaspuj txawm tuaj cuag Tavi, Tavi txawm nrug nwg pw. Tug quaspuj hov nyav ua kevcai ntxuav nwg lub cev kws ua quaspuj taag. Tes tug quaspuj hov txawm rov qaab moog tsev.
Tug quaspuj hov txawm xeeb mivnyuas, nwg txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Tavi paub has tas, “Kuv xeeb mivnyuas lawm.”
Tavi txhad xaa xuv moog has rua Yau‑a tas, “Ca le tso Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai lug cuag kuv.” Yau‑a txhad tso Uliya lug cuag Tavi.
Thaus Uliya lug txug Tavi nug tas Yau‑a nyob le caag, cov tub rog nyob le caag hab kev ua rog kov yeej moog le caag lawm.

Tavi txawm has rua Uliya tas, “Ca le moog rua huv koj lub tsev hab ntxuav koj kwtaw.” Uliya txawm tawm huv vaajntxwv tsev moog hab muaj tuabneeg coj tej hov txhua chaw kws vaajntxwv pub lawv qaab moog rua nwg.
Tassws Uliya ca le nrug vaajntxwv cov tub teg tub taw pw ntawm vaajntxwv tsev lub rooj vaag, tub tsw moog rua huv nwg lub tsev le.
Muaj tuabneeg has rua Tavi tas, “Uliya tsw moog rua huv nwg tsev le.” Tavi txawm has rua Uliya tas, “Koj tub moog kev deb deb lug es ua caag koj tsw moog rua huv koj tsev?”

Uliya has rua Tavi tas, “Lub swb xaab hab cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta nyob huv lub tsev ntaub ua rog. Kuv tug tswv Yau‑a hab koj cov tub teg tub taw kuj ua yeej nyob tom tshaav rog es kuv yuav ca le moog tsev moog noj haus hab nrug kuv tug quaspuj pw tau lov? Koj muaj txujsa nyob hab koj lub sab tseed caj sa pum, kuv yuav tsw ua le ntawd hlo le.”
Tavi txawm has rua Uliya tas, “Nub nua ca le su ntawm nuav pigkig kuv le kheev koj moog.” Uliya txhad nyob huv Yeluxalee nub hov hab nub tom qaab.

Tavi hu nwg lug nwg txhad lug noj lug haus ntawm vaajntxwv xubndag, hab vaajntxwv muab nwg txhaus kuas qaug cawv. Nub ntawd tsaus ntuj nwg kuj moog nrug vaajntxwv cov tub teg tub taw pw ntawm daim lev tsw moog rua huv nwg tsev le.
Taagkig tom qaab Tavi txhad sau ib tsaab ntawv muab rua Uliya coj moog rua Yau‑a.
Tsaab ntawv hov has tas, “Ca le tu kuas Uliya ua paab kws ntaus ua ntej rua ntawm lub chaw kws puab sws tua heev, hab thim tub rog ca nwg raug tua tuag.”
Thaus Yau‑a tseed vej lub nroog nwg tu kuas Uliya moog ntaus ncaaj qhov chaw kws nwg paub tas muaj cov tub rog sab luj sab tuab.
Tes cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog txawm tawm tuaj tiv Yau‑a, mas Tavi cov tub teg tub taw muaj qee leej raug tua tuag. Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai kuj tuag hab.
Yau‑a txawm tso ib tug moog has rua Tavi paub txug kev sws tua zag hov.
Nwg qha tug xaa xuv tas, “Thaus koj pav qhov kws sws tua rua vaajntxwv noog taag lawm,
yog vaajntxwv npau tawg hab nwg has rua koj tas, ‘Ua caag mej yuav moog ntaus ze lub nroog hov ua luaj? Mej tsw paub tas luas yuav tua ntawm ntsaa loog tuaj nua lov?

Leejtwg tua Anpimelej kws yog Yelunpese  tug tub? Tsw yog ib tug quaspuj muab txhwb txwv zeb nrum sau ntsaa loog lug raug nwg tuag ntawm lub moos Thenpes lov? Ua caag mej yuav moog ze lub ntsaa loog?’ tes koj ca le has tas, ‘Vaajntxwv tug tub qhe Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai kuj tuag lawm hab.’ ”
Tug kws xaa xuv txawm moog, nwg has rua Tavi paub txug txhua yaam kws Yau‑a khaiv nwg lug has.
Tug kws xaa xuv hov has rua Tavi tas, “Yeeb ncuab ua tau dua peb, puab tawm tuaj tua peb saab nrau. Tes peb lawv puab moog txug ncua ntawm rooj loog.
Tes cov tub rog kuj tua neev sau ntsaa loog tuaj rua koj cov tub rog. Mas koj cov tub teg tub taw qee leej tuag hab koj tug qhev Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai kuj tuag hab.”

Tavi txawm has rua tug xaa xuv hov tas, “Koj ca le has rua Yau‑a le nuav tas, ‘Tsw xob nyuaj sab rua zaaj nuav, tsua qhov nav ntaaj yeej tua ib zag tug u ib zag tug nuav. Ca le ua rog heev dua qub ntaus kuas tau lub nroog hov.’ Koj txhawb nwg tug zug hab.”
Thaus Uliya tug quaspuj nov tas nwg tug quasyawg Uliya tuag lawm nwg kuj quaj ntsuag nwg tug quasyawg.

Thaus dhau lub swjhawm quaj ntsuag lawm, Tavi txawm khaiv tuabneeg moog coj nwg lug rua huv Tavi lub tsev hab ua Tavi quaspuj hab yug ib tug tub rua Tavi. Tassws Yawmsaub tsw txaus sab rua tej kws Tavi ua ntawd.
Yawmsaub khaiv Nathaa moog cuag Tavi. Nathaa txawm moog txug Tavi hab has tas, “Muaj ob tug txwvneej nyob huv ib lub moos, ib tug nplua nuj ib tug pluag.
Tug nplua nuj muaj tshws muaj yaaj muaj nyuj coob heev.

Tug pluag tsw muaj daabtsw le tsuas muaj tuab tug xyuas yaaj kws nwg yuav lug xwb. Nwg tu hlub hab ca nrug nwg hab nwg cov mivnyuas nyob ua ke, noj ua ke koom haus ib lub khob dej, pw huv nwg lub xubndag, zoo yaam nkaus le ib tug mivntxhais rua nwg.

Tug nplua nuj hov muaj ib tug qhua tuaj tshaam nwg. Nwg tsw kaam muab nwg tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj lug tua tam tug qhua kws tuaj tshaam ntawd, tes nwg txawm muab tug pluag hov tug mivnyuas yaaj lug tua rua tug qhua kws tuaj tshaam nwg noj.”
Tes Tavi txawm npau tawg rua tug nplua nuj hov heev hab has rua Nathaa tas, “Yawmsaub muaj txujsa nyob pum, yuav tsum muab tug yawm kws ua le hov tua pov tseg.
Hab nwg yuav thim tug mivnyuas yaaj rov qaab plaub npaug vem yog nwg ua le nuav nwg tsw muaj sab khuvleej le.”
Nathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Koj yog tug yawm hov ntaag. Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Kuv tub tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixayee hab cawm koj dim huv Xa‑u txhais teg.

Kuv tau muab Xa‑u kws yog koj tug tswv tsev tuabneeg rua koj hab muab nwg tej quaspuj rua huv koj lub xubndag, hab kuv muab cov Yixayee hab cov Yuta huvsw rua koj. Yog npaum le nuav tseed tsawg lawm kuv yuav tsaav ntxwv dua ib npaug hab.

Ua caag koj yuav saib tsw taug Yawmsaub tej lug es ua tej kws nwg pum tas phem kawg? Koj xuas ntaaj tua Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai hab yuav nwg tug quaspuj lug ua koj quaspuj. Koj xuas cov Aamoo raab ntaaj tua nwg ntaag.
Vem le hov nwgnuav nav ntaaj yuav tsw nplaam huv koj caaj ceg hlo le vem yog koj saib tsw taug kuv hab yuav Uliya kws yog tuabneeg Hithai tug quaspuj lug ua koj quaspuj.’

Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, ‘Saib nawj, kuv yuav ua kuas xwm txheej phem tshwm lug huv koj tsev tuabneeg tawm tsaam koj, hab kuv yuav muab koj tej quaspuj coj moog taab meeg koj hab muab pub rua koj kwvtij zej zog, mas tug hov yuav nrug koj tej quaspuj pw taab meeg nruab nub.
Koj ua tej kev txhum hov zais quas nreeg tsw pub leejtwg pum, tassws kuv yuav ua tej nuav nruab nub quas lug taab meeg rua cov Yixayee suavdawg pum.’ ”
Tavi txhad has rua Nathaa tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum muaj txem rua Yawmsaub lawm.” Mas Nathaa has rua Tavi tas, “Yawmsaub zaam koj lub txem lawm, koj yuav tsw tuag.
Txawm le caag kuj xwj vem koj ua tej nuav saib tsw taug Yawmsaub heev kawg, mas tug mivnyuas kws yuav yug lug hov yuav tuag.”
Nathaa txawm rov qaab moog tsev lawm. Mas Yawmsaub ua rua tug mivnyuas kws Uliya tug quaspuj yug rua Tavi hov mob heev.
Tavi txawm taij thov Vaajtswv paab tug mivnyuas hov. Tavi yoo mov hab pw ib mos huv aav.
Cov tub teg tub taw huv vaajntxwv tsev lug rua ntawm nwg yuav tsaa nwg sawv huv aav lug. Tassws nwg tsw kaam hab tsw nrug puab noj mov le.

Tau xyaa nub tug mivnyuas hov txawm tuag lawm. Mas Tavi cov tub teg tub taw ntshai tsw kaav qha rua nwg paub tas tug mivnyuas tuag lawm, puab sws thaam has tas, “Thaus tug mivnyuas hov tseed caj sa nyob peb has rua Tavi, Tavi tub tsw noog. Mas peb yuav ua le caag has tau rua nwg tas tug mivnyuas tuag lawm? Tsaam tes nwg tsua ua le caag rua nwg tug kheej.”

Tassws thaus Tavi pum cov tub teg tub taw sws ntxhw le ntawd, nwg nkaag sab tas tug mivnyuas tuag lawm. Tavi txhad has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Tug mivnyuas tuag lawm lov?” Puab teb tas, “Tuag lawm lauj.”

Tes Tavi txawm sawv tseeg huv aav lug, daa dej pleev roj hloov rwg tsho hab moog rua huv Yawmsaub lub tsev pe hawm Yawmsaub. Nwg moog rua huv nwg lub tsev hab thaus nwg has kuas puab rau mov lug, puab kuj coj mov lug rau rua ntawm nwg xubndag rua nwg noj.

Nwg cov tub teg tub taw txhad nug nwg tas, “Ua caag koj ua le nuav? Koj yoo mov hab quaj txug tug mivnyuas hov rua thaus nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob. Tassws thaus tug mivnyuas tuag lawd koj ca le sawv tseeg lug noj mov.”
Tavi has tas, “Thaus tug mivnyuas tseed caj sa nyob kuv yoo mov hab quaj, vem kuv xaav tas leejtwg yuav paub sov Yawmsaub yuav hlub kuv es pub tug mivnyuas hov muaj txujsa nyob.
Tassws nwgnuav nwg tub tuag lawd es kuv yuav yoo mov ua daabtsw? Kuv yuav ua tau kuas tug mivnyuas caj rov lug lov? Kuv tsuas muaj kws yuav moog rua ntawm nwg, nwg yuav tsw rov lug rua ntawm kuv.”
Tes Tavi txawm nplig nwg tug quaspuj Npasenpa lub sab, hab nrug nwg pw, tes nwg txawm yug tau ib tug tub, mas Tavi tis lub npe hu ua Xalaumoo. Yawmsaub hlub tug mivtub hov.
Mas Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua Nathaa kws ua xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug kuas tis tug mivtub hov npe hu ua Yentintiya  vem yog Yawmsaub hlub.
Yau‑a ntaus cov Aamoo lub nroog Lanpa hab txeeb tau lub chaw ruaj khov kws vaajntxwv nyob.
Yau‑a txawm tso tuabneeg moog has rua Tavi tas, “Kuv saamswm ntaus lub nroog Lanpa hab kuv txeeb tau lub qhov dej huv lub nroog lawm.
Nwgnuav thov koj sau cov tub rog kws tseed tshuav es tuaj ua yeej vej ntaus lub nroog hab txeeb kuas tau, ntshai tsaam kuv txeeb tau tes luas yuav hu lub nroog hov lawv le kuv lub npe.”
Tavi txhad le sau cov tub rog huvsw hab moog rua ntawm Lanpa, nwg ntaus hab txeeb tau lub nroog hov.

Nwg hle lub mom kub ntawm puab tug vaajntxwv lub taubhau lug, yog tseem kub nyaav ib talaa  hab muaj ib lub qai zeb hlaws muaj nqes nyob rua huv. Puab muab lub mom kub hov rua Tavi ntoo. Tavi sau tau tej hov txhua chaw kws txeeb tau huv lub nroog hov ntau kawg le coj moog.

Tavi kuav cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog hov tawm lug hab yuam kuas puab xuas kaw xuas hlau xuas taus ua num hab ua num ntawm lub chaw hlawv thwv cib. Nwg ua ib yaam le nuav rua cov Aamoo txhua lub moos huvsw. Tes Tavi hab cov tub rog suavdawg rov moog rua huv Yeluxalee.
Tavi tug tub Axaloo muaj ib tug muam zoo nkauj hu ua Thama. Nyob nyob Tavi tug tub Aanoo txawm nyam nwg.
Vem yog nwg tug muam Thama nuav mas Aanoo txhad lwj lwj sab ua mob kag, tsua qhov kws nwg tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug le mas Aanoo yeej xaav tas ua tsw tau le caag rua nwg.
Tes Aanoo muaj ib tug phoojywg hu ua Yaunanta, yog Tavi tug tijlaug Sime‑a le tub. Yaunanta yog ib tug ntse.

Nwg txawm has rua Aanoo tas, “Vaajntxwv tug tub 'e, ua caag koj naj taagkig ua ib tug nam nphob quas xuav ntsej muag ntshaus taag? Tsw qha rua kuv paub le lov?” Aanoo teb nwg tas, “Kuv nyam Thama kws yog kuv tug tijlaug Axaloo tug muam.”

Yaunanta txawm has rua nwg tas, “Koj moog pw sau koj lub txaaj ua txuj mob, mas thaus koj txwv tuaj saib koj, ca le has rua nwg tas, ‘Thov khaiv kuv tug muam tuaj muab mov rua kuv noj, kuas nwg tuaj ua mov ntawm kuv xubndag sub kuv txhad le pum hab tau noj ntawm nwg txhais teg ntaag.’ ”

Aanoo txawm pw ua txuj mob. Thaus vaajntxwv tuaj saib, Aanoo txawm has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Thov khaiv kuv tug muam Thama tuaj ua ob peb lub ncuav ntawm kuv xubndag sub kuv txhad le tau noj ntawm nwg txhais teg.”
Tavi txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Thama huv tsev tas, “Ca le moog ntawm koj tug nug Aanoo tsev moog ua mov rua nwg noj.”
Thama txhad moog rua ntawm nwg tug nug Aanoo tsev kws Aanoo pw hov. Nwg kuj muab moov mog lug zuaj ua ncuav ntawm Aanoo xubndag hab muab ci.
Nwg rhu lub taig ci ncuav lug laub txawb rua ntawm Aanoo xubndag. Tassws Aanoo tsw kaam noj. Aanoo has tas, “Kuas lwm tug tawm moog tsaiv.” Txhua tug txhad tawm moog lawm.

Aanoo txawm has rua Thama tas, “Ca le coj cov ncuav lug rua huv txaaj sub kuv txhad noj ntawm koj txhais teg.” Thama kuj coj cov ncuav kws nwg ua hov moog rua huv lub txaaj muab rua nwg tug nug Aanoo.
Tes thaus nwg coj cov ncuav lug ze yuav muab rua Aanoo noj, Aanoo txawm ntsab nkaus nwg ca has tas, “Leej muam, koj ca le lug nrug kuv pw.”
Nwg teb Aanoo tas, “Leej nug, tsw tau le, tsw xob yuam kuv le. Tej kev zoo le nuav yeej tsw tswm nyog ua huv cov Yixayee. Tsw xob ua tej kev phem kev qas le nuav hlo le.

Hab kuv los kuv yuav muab txujkev txaaj muag nuav coj moog nraim rua hovtwg? Hab koj los koj yuav ua zoo le tug nam tuabneeg ruag huv cov Yixayee. Vem le nuav thov koj has rua vaajntxwv tsaiv. Vaajntxwv yuav tsw txwv es tsw pub kuv rua koj.”
Tassws Aanoo tsw noog nwg has le. Aanoo muaj zug heev dua nwg txhad muab nwg yuam tau pw lawm.
Dhau hov Aanoo txawm ntxub nwg kawg le. Mas txujkev ntxub nuav luj dhau qhov kws thau nwg nyam. Tes Aanoo txawm has rua nwg tas, “Ca le sawv tswv moog.”
Tassws Thama has rua nwg tas, “Leej nug, tsw xob ua le. Qhov kws koj muab kuv ntab tawm nuav tseed txhum luj dua le kws koj tau ua rua kuv lawd.” Kuas Aanoo tsw noog nwg has le.
Nwg ca le hu tug hluas kws ua koom rua nwg has tas, “Ca le muab tug puj nuav lawv kuas tawm dhau ntawm kuv lub xubndag moog, es muab qhov rooj kaw muab laag rua.”
Thama naav lub tsho ntev muaj teg, yaam le vaajntxwv tej ntxhais kws tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug ib txwm naav. Tug tub teg tub taw hov txawm muab Thama lawv tawm moog hab muab qhov rooj laag rua.
Thama muab tshauv tsuab rua sau nwg taubhau hab muab nwg lub tsho ntev kws nwg naav dua rhe. Nwg muab teg puab taubhau quaj taug kev moog.

Nwg tug nug Axaloo txawm has rua nwg tas, “Koj tug nug Aanoo nrug koj nyob lawm lov? Leej muam, ua tuabywv. Nwg yog koj le nug. Tsw xob ntxhuv sab rua qhov nuav.” Thama txawm nyob ua sab nduag taag rua huv nwg tug nug Axaloo lub tsev.
Thaus vaajntxwv Tavi paub txug zaaj nuav huvsw nwg chim heev.
Tassws Axaloo tsw has ib lus le caag rua Aanoo le txawm yog zoo hab phem, tsua qhov Axaloo ntxub Aanoo kawg vem qhov kws yuam nwg tug muam Thama.
Tau ob xyoo tom qaab Axaloo ndav zug txav plaub yaaj ntawm Npa‑aa Haxau kws nyob ze Efa‑i, mas Axaloo hu vaajntxwv cov tub suavdawg moog rua hov ntawd.
Axaloo moog has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Kuv kws yog koj tug qhev ndav zug txav plaub yaaj mas thov vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw nrug kuv moog hab.”

Tassws vaajntxwv has rua Axaloo tas, “Tub, tsw xob ua le hov, peb tsw xob moog huvsw tsaam tes peb ua nraa nyaav rua koj.” Axaloo taij taij vaajntxwv los nwg tsw kaam moog. Vaajntxwv ca le foom koob moov rua nwg xwb.
Axaloo txhad thov has tas, “Yog koj tsw moog los thov tso kuv tug kwv Aanoo nrug peb moog.” Vaajntxwv has rua nwg tas, “Ua le caag nwg yuav tsum nrug koj moog?”
Kuas Axaloo taij taij txug thaus vaajntxwv kheev Aanoo hab vaajntxwv cov tub suavdawg nrug nwg moog.

Mas Axaloo has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Tog saib ntsoov thaus twg Aanoo haus cawv zoo sab heev mas thaus kuv has kuas mej ntaus Aanoo tes mej ca le muab nwg tua kag. Tsw xob ntshai le, yog kuv has kuas mej ua. Ca le ua sab luj sab tuab.”
Mas Axaloo cov tub teg tub taw kuj ua rua Aanoo lawv le Axaloo has kuas puab ua. Mas vaajntxwv cov tub suavdawg ca le sawv pis tseeg nyag caij nyag tug luj txwv tswv.
Mas thaus cov tub hov tseed taug kev, Tavi nov xuv tas, “Axaloo tub muab vaajntxwv cov tub tua tuag taag huvsw tsw tshuav ib tug le.”
Vaajntxwv sawv tseeg muab lub tsho dua rhe pw ndo huv peg teb. Cov tub teg tub taw kws nyob ze Tavi suavdawg kuj muab tsho dua rhe.

Tassws Tavi tug tijlaug Sime‑a tug tub Yaunanta has tas, “Koj tsw xob xaav tas puab tua koj cov tub taag huvsw lawm, tsuas yog Aanoo tuab leeg tuag xwb. Qhov kws Axaloo has kuas ua le nuav nwg tub npaaj thaus Aanoo yuam nwg tug muam Thama lug lawm.
Mas vaajntxwv tsw xob tu sab tsw xob ntxhuv sab, tsw xob xaav tas vaajntxwv cov tub tuag taag huvsw lawm, tsuas yog Aanoo tuab leeg tuag xwb.”
Tes Axaloo txawm tswv lawm. Tug hluas kws faajxwm zuv lub moos tsaa muag saib mas pum tuabneeg coob coob saamswm tuaj taug txujkev Haulana‑i ntawm ib saab roob lug.
Yaunanta txhad has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Saib maj, vaajntxwv cov tub kuj lug lawm. Yeej muaj tseeb le kws kuv kws yog koj tug qhev has rua koj lawm.”
Thaus nwg has lug xaus nkaus vaajntxwv cov tub lug txug tsaa suab hlo quaj. Vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg kuj quaj lwj sab kawg.
Axaloo tswv moog cuag Amihu tug tub Thaamai kws ua vaajntxwv huv Kesu tebchaws. Tavi kuj naj nub quaj nwg tug tub.
Axaloo kuj tswv moog rua Kesu tebchaws moog nyob huv tau peb xyoos.
Vaajntxwv ncu dai sab quas dhuas Axaloo. Tavi lub sab kws ncu Aanoo kws tuag lawd mas rov zoo quas zug.
Xeluya tug tub Yau‑a pum tas vaajntxwv ncu Axaloo heev ua dai sab quas dhuas.

Yau‑a txawm tso tuabneeg moog rua lub moos Thekhau‑a es coj ib tug quaspuj ntse ntsuav lug mas has rua nwg tas, “Koj ua txuj le tug kws quaj tej tuag hab naav lub tsho kws ncu tuag. Tsw xob pleev roj tsw qaab, ua txuj yaam le tug puj kws tub quaj tej tuag tau ntau nub lawd,
mas moog cuag vaajntxwv, moog has le nuav rua nwg.” Mas Yau‑a qha lug rua tug puj hov.
Thaus tug quaspuj huv Thekhau‑a tuaj cuag vaajntxwv nwg txawm khwb ti nkaus aav pe vaajntxwv mas has tas, “Au vaajntxwv, thov paab kuv.”
Vaajntxwv has rua nwg tas, “Koj muaj teeb meem daabtsw?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog ib tug nam puj ntsuag, kuv tug quasyawg tuag lawm.
Kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev muaj ob tug tub sws tshe tom teb. Tsw muaj leejtwg paab cheem ob tug mas ib tug txhad muab ib tug ntaus tuag lawm.

Mas cov kwvtij suavdawg tuaj nrhav cai rua kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev has tas, ‘Muab tug kws tua nwg tug tijlaug rua peb, sub peb txhad muab nwg tua tau pov tseg pauj taub qhov kws nwg tua nwg tijlaug hov. Mas puab yuav muab tug kws yuav saws qub txeeg qub teg tua hab.’ Txawm yaam nkaus le yuav tua kuv lub ncaig tawg kws tseed tshuav tsw pub kuv quasyawg muaj npe muaj keeb nyob nplajteb nuav le lawm.”
Vaajntxwv txhad has rua tug puj hov tas, “Ca le rov moog tsev, kuv yeej yuav has kuas luas tu koj tshaaj plaub.”
Mas tug puj Thekhau‑a has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, ca lub txem poob rua sau kuv hab kuv txwv caaj ceg. Tassws vaajntxwv hab vaajntxwv lub zwm txwv tsw xob raug txem.”
Vaajntxwv has tas, “Yog muaj leejtwg has le caag rua koj, ca le coj tug hov tuaj cuag kuv, mas tug hov yuav tsw kov koj dua le lawm.”

Tug puj hov txawm has tas, “Thov vaajntxwv tuav Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv lub npe cog lug twv, sub tug tsob caub txhad tsw tua dua le lawm, kuv tug tub txhad tsw raug puam tsuaj.” Vaajntxwv has tas, “Yawmsaub muaj txujsa nyob pum, koj tug tub yuav tsw poob ib txuj plaubhau rua huv aav.”
Mas tug puj hov has tas, “Vaajntxwv, thov ca kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev has ib lu lug rua vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv.” Vaajntxwv has tas, “Has maj.”

Tug puj txhad has tas, “Ua le caag koj npaaj ua le nuav rua Vaajtswv haiv tuabneeg? Qhov kws has le nuav mas kuj yog koj has koj qhov txhum, tsua qhov koj tsw coj tug kws koj muab lawv tswv rov lug rua huv koj tsev.

Mas peb suavdawg yuav tuag taag yaam nkaus le cov dej kws nchuav rua huv peg teb yawm tsw tau rov lug. Vaajtswv tsw txuv txujsa, tassws Vaajtswv nrhav kev rua tug kws raug muab lawv tswv lawd tsw xob raug muab pov tseg.

Qhov kws kuv tuaj has zaaj nuav rua vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv vem yog cov pejxeem hem kuv ntshai. Mas kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev xaav tas, ‘Kuv yuav moog has vaajntxwv, tej zag vaajntxwv yuav ua lawv le vaajntxwv tug qhev lu lug thov.
Nyab vaajntxwv yuav noog hab cawm kuv kws yog vaajntxwv tug qhev dim ntawm tug kws npaaj sab muab kuv hab kuv tug tub rhuav tshem kuas tsw tau tej qub txeeg qub teg kws Vaajtswv pub.’

Mas koj tug nkauj qhev xaav tas, ‘Vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv tej lug yuav ua rua kuv lub sab tug, tsua qhov vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv mas zoo yaam nkaus le Vaajtswv tug tubkhai ntuj, kws paub qhov phem qhov zoo. Thov Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv nrug koj nyob.’ ”
Tes vaajntxwv txawm teb tug quaspuj hov tas, “Tej kws kuv yuav nug koj nuav koj tsw xob zais nav.” Tug puj hov has tas, “Thov vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv has maj.”

Vaajntxwv txawm has tas, “Koj zaaj nuav huvsw Yau‑a txhais teg txuam huv los tsw txuam?” Tug puj teb tas, “Au vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, koj muaj txujsa nyob pum, tsw muaj leejtwg zos dhau vaajntxwv tej lug rua saab xws los saab phem hlo le. Tub yog koj tug qhev Yau‑a kuas kuv thov le nuav ntaag. Nwg yog tug kws qha kuv kws yog koj tug nkauj qhev has tej lug nuav.
Yau‑a ua le nuav sub txhad le ntxeev tau tej xwm txheej nuav. Tassws kuv tug tswv muaj tswvyim cuag nkaus le Vaajtswv tug tubkhai ntuj le tswvyim kws paub txhua yaam huv nplajteb nuav.”
Vaajntxwv has rua Yau‑a tas, “Kuv kheev ua lawv le nuav. Ca le moog coj tug tub hluas Axaloo rov lug.”

Yau‑a kuj khoov ntshws rua huv peg teb pe hab foom koob moov rua vaajntxwv. Yau‑a has tas, “Vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, nub nua kuv kws yog koj tug qhev paub tas koj txaus sab rua kuv tsua qhov kws koj pub lawv le koj tug qhev lu lug thov.”
Yau‑a txhad sawv tseeg moog rua Kesu tebchaws moog coj Axaloo rov qaab lug rua huv Yeluxalee.
Mas vaajntxwv has tas, “Kuas nwg nyob huv nwg lub tsev xwb, tsw xob kheev nwg lug cuag kuv.” Axaloo kuj moog nyob huv nwg lub tsev, tawm tsw tau moog cuag vaajntxwv le.
Taag nrho huv cov Yixayee tsw muaj ib tug twg kws luas yuav qhuas tas zoo nraug le Axaloo. Txwj nrho ntawm xwb taw moog thoob plawg sau taj taubhau nwg tsw muaj ib qho phem le.

Txhua xyoo thaus xyoo laug taag nwg txav ib zag plaubhau vem nwg cov plaubhau nyaav hwv lawm txhad muab txav. Thaus muab txav lawd nwg muab kiv mas nyaav ob puas sekhee  lawv le tej vaajntxwv raab teev.
Axaloo yug tau peb tug tub hab ib tug ntxhais hu ua Thama, yog ib tug ntxhais zoo zoo nkauj le.
Axaloo nyob tau ob xyoos txwm nkaus huv lub nroog Yeluxalee tsw tau cuag vaajntxwv ib zag le.
Tes Axaloo txawm tso tuabneeg moog hu Yau‑a tuaj xaav khaiv Yau‑a moog cuag vaajntxwv, kuas Yau‑a tsw kaam tuaj. Nwg rov tso dua tuabneeg moog hu zag ob los Yau‑a tsw kaam tuaj.

Axaloo txawm has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Yau‑a daim teb nyob npuas kuv daim, nwg cov qeb tseed nyob huv teb. Mej ca le moog muab hlawv.” Axaloo cov tub teg tub taw txawm moog hlawv daim teb hov.
Yau‑a txhad sawv tseeg tuaj cuag Axaloo huv nwg lub tsev mas has rua nwg tas, “Ua le caag koj cov tub teg tub taw muab kuv daim teb hlawv.”

Axaloo teb Yau‑a tas, “Kuv tub ua xuv kuas koj tuaj ntawm nuav es kuv yuav khaiv koj moog cuag vaajntxwv moog nug has tas, ‘Kuas kuv lug ntawm Kesu lug ua daabtsw? Kuv nyob kuv tim Kesu kuj zoo dua.’ Thov ca kuv moog cuag vaajntxwv nwgnuav. Yog tas kuv muaj txem kuj ca nwg muab kuv tua pov tseg.”

Yau‑a txhad moog cuag vaajntxwv hab has tej nuav rua nwg. Vaajntxwv txhad hu Axaloo tuaj. Axaloo txhad tuaj cuag vaajntxwv khoov ntshws ua lub plhu ti nkaus rua huv aav pe ntawm vaajntxwv xubndag, mas vaajntxwv txhad nwj Axaloo.
Lug rua tom qaab nuav Axaloo yuav tau ib lub tsheb ua rog hab neeg hab muaj tub teg tub taw tswb caug leej ua nwg ntej.

Axaloo pheej sawv ntxuv moog sawv rua ntawm ntug kev ntawm rooj loog. Yog leejtwg muaj plaub yuav has kuas vaajntxwv tu, Axaloo kuj hu tug hov has tas, “Koj tuaj lub moos twg tuaj?” Thaus tug hov teb tas nwg yog xeem u xeem nua huv cov Yixayee,
mas Axaloo txawm has rua nwg tas, “Tej lug kws koj tuaj thov kuj zoo hab raug cai, tassws vaajntxwv tsw tau tsaa leejtwg ua tug kws noog koj tej lug.”
Hab Axaloo has ntxwv tas, “Kheev laam yog kuv tau ua tug tu plaub huv lub tebchaws nuav. Mas thaus leejtwg muaj plaub muaj ntug tau tuaj cuag kuv mas kuv yuav tu ncaaj nceeg rua tug hov.”
Thaus leejtwg tuaj ze yuav pe nwg, nwg cev teg hlo moog ntsab tug hov ca hab nwj.
Axaloo ua le nuav rua txhua tug Yixayee kws tuaj thov vaajntxwv tu plaub. Axaloo ua le nuav kuas cov Yixayee qaug sab rua nwg.
Thaus dhau plaub xyoos lawd Axaloo has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Thov koj tso kev ca kuv moog rua huv lub moos Heploo moog pauj tej kws kuv tau fev ca rua Yawmsaub lawd.

Kuv kws yog koj tug qhev tub cog lug fev rua thaus kuv nyob huv lub moos Kesu huv Alaa tebchaws lawm tas, ‘Yog Yawmsaub coj kuv lug txug lub nroog Yeluxalee kuv yuav moog pe hawm Yawmsaub rua huv lub moos Heploo.’ ”
Vaajntxwv teb nwg tas, “Ca le moog zoo.” Tes nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog rua lub moos Heploo.
Tassws Axaloo tso tuabneeg xaa xuv tuabywv moog thoob plawg txhua xeem Yixayee has tas, “Thaus twg mej nov lub suab raaj kub yaaj mej ca le qw has tas, ‘Axaloo ua vaajntxwv huv lub moos Heploo.’ ”
Muaj ob puas tug txwvneej nrug Axaloo tawm huv lub nroog Yeluxalee moog yog cov kws Axaloo caw moog, puab moog dawb dawb do do xwb tsw paub daabtsw le.

Thaus Axaloo tua tsaj xyeem hov nwg kuj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Ahithaufee kws yog tuabneeg Kilau hab yog Tavi tug tub sablaaj tuaj huv nwg lub moos Kilau tuaj. Qhov kws tuav tswvyim phem yuav faav xeeb hov luj quas zug hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug Axaloo koom kuj coob quas zug tuaj.
Muaj ib tug tuaj cuag Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Cov Yixayee tub qaug sab lawv Axaloo qaab lawm.”

Tes Tavi txawm has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg kws nrug nwg nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalee tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg, peb ca le tswv moog. Tsw ua le ntawd tes peb yuav tswv tsw dim Axaloo. Peb ca le maaj nroog moog sai sai tsaam tes nwg lawv cuag peb hab ua phem rua peb hab xuas nav ntaaj nav rag ntaus lub nroog nuav.”
Vaajntxwv cov tub teg tub taw has rua nwg tas, “Vaajntxwv txav sab ua le caag, peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe kuj npaaj txhwj yuav ua le ntawd.”
Tes vaajntxwv hab nwg tsev tuabneeg suavdawg ua ke tawm tswv moog tseg kaum tug hluas nkauj kws vaajntxwv kaav ca zuv lub vaaj lub tsev.
Vaajntxwv tawm moog hab cov tuabneeg suavdawg lawv nwg qaab moog. Puab moog nreg ntawm lub tsev kws kawg nkaus ntawm ntug nroog.
Tavi cov tub teg tub taw hlaa ua nwg ntej moog. Hab cov Khelethi hab cov Pelethi  suavdawg hab cov tuabneeg Ka rau pua leej kws nrug Tavi ua ke huv lub moos Ka lug kuj hlaa ua vaajntxwv ntej moog.
Vaajntxwv has rua Ithai kws yog tuabneeg Ka tas, “Ua caag koj nrug peb moog? Koj ca le rov qaab moog hab nrug vaajntxwv nyob, tsua qhov koj yog lwm haiv tuabneeg hab yog ib tug kws poob tebchaws.

Naag koj nyav tuaj txug xwb, nub nua kuv yuav ua rua koj nrug peb moog moog lug lug lov, tsua qhov kuv tsw paub tas yuav moog rua hovtwg? Ca le rov qaab moog hab coj koj cov kwvtij moog hab. Thov Yawmsaub ua nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab nwg txujkev ncaaj kws tso sab tau tshwm lug rua koj.”

Tassws Ithai teb vaajntxwv tas, “Muaj Yawmsaub kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, hab muaj kuv tug vaajntxwv kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv yuav nyob hovtwg, txawm yog yuav tuag yuav caj, los kuv kws yog koj tug qhev yuav nyob hov ntawd hab.”
Tavi txhad has rua Ithai tas, “Ca le hlaa moog.” Ithai kws yog tuabneeg Ka txhad le moog nrug nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg hab puab cov mivnyuas suavdawg ua ke.
Thaus cov tuabneeg suavdawg saamswm hlaa moog cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws suavdawg quaj nrov nrov. Vaajntxwv hlaa lub haav Khiloo hab cov tuabneeg suavdawg moog rua tom tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Xantau hab cov Levi suavdawg kwv Vaajtswv lub swb xaab sws cog lug tuaj hab. Puab muab Vaajtswv lub swb xaab txu moog txug thaus cov tuabneeg suavdawg tawm huv lub nroog taag.

Tes vaajntxwv txawm has rua Xantau tas, “Ca le kwv Vaajtswv lub swb xaab rov moog rua huv lub nroog. Yog Yawmsaub txaus sab rua kuv nwg yuav coj kuv rov qaab lug hab pub kuv pum lub swb xaab hab Yawmsaub lub chaw nyob.
Tassws yog Yawmsaub has tas, ‘Kuv tsw txaus sab rua koj,’ saib maj, kuv nyob ntawm nuav, ca Yawmsaub ua rua kuv lawv le nwg pum zoo.”

Hab vaajntxwv has rua tug pov thawj Xantau tas, “Koj yog tug kws pum tom hauv ntej lov? Koj hab Anpiyatha hab meb ob tug tub ca le rov qaab moog zoo rua huv lub nroog, yog koj tug tub Ahima‑a hab Anpiyatha tug tub Yaunathaa.
Kuv yuav nyob ntawm lub chaw hlaa dej moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua tog txug thaus koj le xuv tuaj rua kuv paub.”
Tes Xantau hab Anpiyatha txhad kwv Vaajtswv lub swb xaab rov qaab moog ca rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee hab ob tug nyob rua huv.

Tavi nce taug txujkev moog rua sau lub roob txwv Aulib, nwg quaj quas lawg moog, muaj ntaub kauv taubhau tsw muaj khau rau. Cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg ua ke suavdawg kuj muab ntaub kauv taubhau taug kev quaj quas lawg moog.

Muaj tuabneeg has rua Tavi tas, “Ahithaufee nrug Axaloo cov tuabneeg faav xeeb ua ib nqaag lawm hab.” Mas Tavi has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, thov koj ua kuas Ahithaufee tej lug sablaaj tsw muaj tseeb tsw tau qaabhau.”
Thaus Tavi tuaj txug lub ncov roob kws pe Vaajtswv mas Husai kws yog Akhi cum txawm tuaj cuag nwg, lub tsho nduag taag hab muaj moov aav sau nwg lub taubhau.
Tavi has rua nwg tas, “Yog koj nrug kuv moog koj yuav ua nraa rua kuv xwb.

Tassws yog koj rov qaab moog rua huv lub nroog hab has rua Axaloo tas, ‘Au vaajntxwv, kuv yuav ua koj qhev. Yaav tom ntej kuv ua koj txwv qhev le caag, kuv yuav ua koj qhev le ntawd.’ Tes koj yuav paab kuv ua rua Ahithaufee tej lug sablaaj swb hlo.
Xantau hab Anpiyatha kws ua pov thawj kuj nrug koj nyob hov ntawd. Txhua yaam kws koj nov huv vaajntxwv lub tsev koj ca le has rua Xantau hab Anpiyatha paub.
Ob tug tej tub kuj nyob hov ntawd hab, yog Xantau tug tub Ahima‑a hab Anpiyatha tug tub Yaunathaa. Txhua yaam kws koj nov, ca le khaiv puab tuaj has rua kuv paub.”
Tes Tavi tug kwvluag Husai txawm rov lug rua huv lub nroog rua thaus Axaloo saamswm lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee hab.

Thaus Tavi moog dhau lub ncov roob mivntswv lawd Xinpa kws yog Mefinpause tug tub qhe txawm tuaj cuag Tavi, muaj ib nkawm neeg luav pem eeb hab thauj ob puas lub ncuav hab ib puas tauv txwv maab qhuav hab ib puas lub txwv ntoo caij ntuj kub hab ib naab tawv cawv txwv maab.

Vaajntxwv has rua Xinpa tas, “Koj coj tej nuav tuaj ua daabtsw?” Xinpa teb tas, “Nkawm neeg luav nuav muab rua koj tsev tuabneeg caij, cov ncuav hab cov txwv ntoo caij ntuj kub muab rua koj cov tuabneeg noj, hab cov cawv txwv maab muab rua cov kws tsaug leeg huv tebchaws moj saab qhua haus.”

Vaajntxwv has rua nwg tas, “Koj tug tswv Xa‑u tug xeeb ntxwv nyob hovtwg?” Xinpa has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Nwg nyob huv Yeluxalee, tsua qhov nwg has tas, ‘Nub nua cov Yixayee yuav muab kuv yawm lub tebchaws rov rua kuv kaav.’ ”

Vaajntxwv txawm has rua Xinpa tas, “Nwgnuav Mefinpause le ib puas tsaav yaam poob ua koj le.” Xinpa has tas, “Kuv pe koj ua koj tsuag. Vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv, thov koj hlub kuv moog ib txhws.”
Thaus vaajntxwv Tavi moog txug ntawm lub moos Npahuli, muaj ib tug yawm yog Xa‑u cuab tuabneeg hu ua Sime‑i yog Kela le tub tawm tuaj tshev foom taug kev tsw tu le,
hab laim pob zeb tuaj rua Tavi hab Tavi cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg. Tavi cov tuabneeg hab cov tub rog sab luj sab tuab suavdawg kuj nyob ntawm nwg saab xws hab saab phem.
Sime‑i tshev has tas, “Nam tuabneeg noj nyoog, nam tuabneeg limham, ca le tswv moog, ca le tswv moog los maj!

Yawmsaub pauj taub Xa‑u tsev tuabneeg tej ntshaav rua koj. Koj nyob nwg chaw kaav kuas Yawmsaub muab lub tebchaws rua koj tug tub Axaloo kaav. Saib maj, kev puam tsuaj lug raug koj lawm, vem koj yog tuabneeg noj nyoog.”
Anpisai kws yog Xeluya tug tub txawm has rua vaajntxwv tas, “Ua caag yuav ca tug dev tuag nuav tshev foom vaajntxwv kws yog kuv tug tswv? Thov ca kuv moog muab nwg lub taubhau txav pov tseg.”

Tassws vaajntxwv has tas, “Xeluya ob tug tub 'e, kuv thaab txug meb daabtsw? Yog tug hov tshev foom vem Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, ‘Ca le tshev foom Tavi,’ mas leejtwg yuav kaav has rua nwg tas, ‘Ua caag koj ua le nuav?’ ”

Tavi has rua Anpisai hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg tas, “Swm xaav saib, kuv tug tub ntaag los tseed nrhav txuv kuv txujsa, tug tuabneeg Npeeyamee nuav yimfuab yuav ua le ntawd hab. Ca nwg nyob nwg, ca nwg tshev foom nwg, vem yog Yawmsaub has rua nwg lawm.
Tej zag Yawmsaub yuav tsaa muag saib kuv txujkev txom nyem nyuaj sab hab Yawmsaub yuav ua qhov zoo pauj qhov kws nub nua nwg tshev foom kuv.”
Tes Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg pheej taug kev moog tassws Sime‑i moog lawv qaum kev tshev foom hab laim pob zeb w moov aav rua puab.
Vaajntxwv hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg suavdawg moog txug tug dej Yalatee txug sav kawg, txhad le su hov ntawd kuas lug sav.
Axaloo hab cov pejxeem suavdawg kws yog cov Yixayee kuj lug txug huv lub nroog Yeluxalee, Ahithaufee kuj nrug puab lug hab.
Thaus Tavi tug kwvluag Husai kws yog Akhi cum tuaj cuag Axaloo, Husai has rua Axaloo tas, “Thov kuas vaajntxwv muaj txujsa luj sav ntev, thov ca vaajntxwv muaj txujsa luj sav ntev.”
Axaloo has rua Husai tas, “Nuav yog koj ua zoo rua koj tug kwvluag lov? Ua caag tsw nrug koj tug kwvluag moog?”
Husai has rua Axaloo tas, “Tsw yog le ntawd. Yawmsaub hab cov pejxeem nuav hab cov Yixayee suavdawg xaiv tug twg, kuv yuav tuaj tug hov tog hab kuv yuav nrug tug hov nyob.
Dua ib qho tswm nyog kuv ua koom rua tug twg? Tsw yog nwg tug tub lov? Kuv tub ua koom rua koj txwv le caag lawm, kuv yuav ua koom rua koj ib yaam le ntawd.”
Axaloo has rua Ahithaufee tas, “Thov koj qha saib peb yuav ua le caag txhad zoo.”

Ahithaufee has rua Axaloo tas, “Ca le moog nrug koj txwv cov hluas nkauj kws nwg tseg ca zuv tsev pw. Cov Yixayee suavdawg yuav nov tas koj muab koj tug kheej ua yaam kws koj txwv ntxub kawg le mas cov tuabneeg kws tuaj koj tog txhais teg yuav muaj zug heev.”
Puab txhad nthuav tsev ntaub rua sau txheej tsev laag tshaav, mas Axaloo moog nrug nwg txwv cov hluas nkauj pw taab meeg cov Yixayee suavdawg.
Lub swjhawm ntawd puab saib Ahithaufee tej lug tseem ceeb zoo yaam nkaus le Vaajtswv has ntaag. Txawm yog Tavi hab Axaloo los kuj saib hlub Ahithaufee txhua lu lug taw qha.
Hab Ahithaufee has rua Axaloo tas, “Thov ca kuv xaiv ib vaam ob txheeb tug tub rog es mo nuav kuv sawv kev moog lawv Tavi.
Kuv yuav moog lawv cuag rua thaus nwg txug sav heev hab poob sab ua rua nwg ntshai raag zum zawg, cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg ua ke suavdawg yuav tswv taag. Kuv yuav tua kag vaajntxwv tuab leeg xwb,

hab kuv yuav coj cov pejxeem suavdawg rov lug rua koj.  Thaus kws tua tau tuab tug kws koj cheem tsum xwb, tes kuj tau cov pejxeem suavdawg rov lug lawm, hab cov pejxeem suavdawg yuav nyob kaaj sab lug.”
Cov lug nuav hum Axaloo hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug suavdawg lub sab.
Axaloo txhad has tas, “Ca le hu Husai kws yog Akhi cum lug. Peb yuav noog saib nwg has le caag.”
Thaus Husai lug cuag Axaloo, Axaloo has rua nwg tas, “Ahithaufee has le nuav lawm. Tswm nyog ua lawv le nwg qha los tsw tswm nyog ua? Yog tsw tswm nyog ua, koj ca le has.”
Husai has rua Axaloo tas, “Tej kws Ahithaufee has zag nuav tsw zoo.”

Husai has ntxwv tas, “Koj yeej paub tas koj txwv hab nwg cov tuabneeg yog tub rog sab tuab. Puab saamswm npau tawg heev yaam le tug maum dais tom haav zoov kws luas coj cov mivnyuas moog lawm. Dua le ntawd koj txwv yog tug kws txawj ua rog heev hab mo ntuj nwg yuav tsw nrug nwg cov tub rog pw ua ke.

Swm saib, taamswm nuav nwg moog nraim rua huv lub qhov lossws nyob dua rua ib qho lawm. Thaus koj cov tub rog moog ntaus rog thawj zag es qee leej raug tuag, leejtwg nov los yuav has tas, ‘Axaloo cov tub rog raug tua tuag.’

Tes txawm yog cov tub rog kws sab tuab hab lub sab zoo yaam nkaus le tug tsuv ntxhuav los yuav ntshai sab yaaj taag, vem cov Yixayee suavdawg yeej paub tas koj txwv yog tug kws muaj zug heev hab nwg cov tub rog kuj sab tuab.

Kuv le lug qha koj yog le nuav, koj sau cov Yixayee suavdawg txwj ntawm lub moos Ntaaj moog txug lub moos Npe‑awsenpa ua tau tub rog coob yaam nkaus le tej xuab zeb ntawm ntug havtxwv mas koj ua tug kws kaav cov tub rog moog ntaag.
Mas peb ntswb nwg hovtwg kuj xwj, peb yuav nas ntho nwg yaam nkaus lwg lug rua huv aav. Mas Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg yuav tsw tshuav ib tug le.
Yog nwg thim moog rua huv lub moos twg, cov Yixayee suavdawg yuav coj hlua moog nqug lub moos hov rua huv haav dej, ua kuas tsw tshuav ib lub qai zeb nyob ntawm lub chaw hlo le.”

Axaloo hab cov Yixayee suavdawg has tas, “Tej lug kws Husai kws yog Akhi cum qha zoo dua tej lug kws Ahithaufee qha.” Yawmsaub tub npaaj tseg ua kuas tej lug zoo kws Ahithaufee qha kov tsw yeej sub Yawmsaub txhad coj tau tej xwm txheej phem lug raug Axaloo.
Husai txawm has rua Xantau hab Anpiyatha kws ua pov thawj tas, “Ahithaufee tau qha le u le nuav rua Axaloo hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug, hab kuv qha le u le nuav.

Yog le hov ca le maaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua Tavi has tas, ‘Mo nuav nwg tsw xob su ntawm lub chaw kws hlaa dej moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua, ca le hlaa hlo moog tsaam tes vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg yuav raug muab nqog hlo huvsw.’ ”

Yaunathaa hab Ahima‑a saamswm tog hov ntawm lub qhov dej Eelaukee. Muaj ib tug nkauj qhev pheej moog qha rua ob tug, tes ob tug txhad moog has rua Tavi, tsua qhov ob tug tsw kaav moog rua huv lub nroog rua leejtwg pum.

Tassws muaj ib tug tub hluas pum ob tug tes txawm moog has rua Axaloo. Ob tug txhad maaj nroog tswv moog txug ib tug yawm lub tsev huv lub moos Npahuli. Yawm hov muaj ib lub qhov dej nyob ntawm tog tsev, ob tug txawm nqeg moog nyob huv lub qhov ntawd.
Tug yawm hov quaspuj txawm muab ntaub lug npug lub ncauj qhov hab muab qoob lug zab rua sau, tsw muaj leejtwg paub le.

Thaus Axaloo cov tub teg tub taw tuaj txug ntawm tug quaspuj hov lub tsev, puab txawm nug tas, “Ahima‑a hab Yaunathaa nyob hovtwg?” Tug quaspuj hov teb tas, “Ob tug hlaa dej moog dhau lawm.” Thaus puab nrhav tsw pum ob tug, puab txawm rov moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalee.

Thaus cov tuabneeg hov rov moog lawd, ob tug le tawm huv lub qhov lug hab moog qha rua vaajntxwv Tavi. Ob tug has rua Tavi tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg maaj nroog hlaa tug dej moog vem yog Ahithaufee tub qha le u le nuav txug koj.”
Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg txawm sawv tseeg hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog. Thaus kaaj ntug tes tsw tshuav ib tug kws tsw tau hlaa tug dej Yalatee le.

Thaus Ahithaufee pum tas puab tsw ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg qha, nwg txawm pem eeb caij neeg luav moog rua nwg lub tsev kws nyob huv nwg lub moos lawm. Thaus nwg tu nwg lub cuab txhwj lawm nwg txawm moog dai cej daab tuag, puab txhad muab nwg log rua huv nwg txwv lub qhov ntxaa.
Tavi txawm moog txug lub moos Mahana‑i. Tes Axaloo hab cov txwvneej Yixayee suavdawg txawm hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog.
Axaloo tub tsaa Amaxa ua thawj rog nyob Yau‑a chaw. Amaxa yog ib tug Yixayee  hu ua Ithala le tub. Ithala yuav Anpikaa kws yog Naha tug ntxhais hab yog Xeluya kws yog Yau‑a nam tug nam hluas.
Cov Yixayee hab Axaloo ua yeej nyob huv Kile‑a tebchaws.

Thaus Tavi tuaj txug ntawm lub moos Mahana‑i, mas Saunpi kws yog Naha tug tub kws yog tuabneeg huv lub moos Lanpa huv Aamoo tebchaws, hab Makhi kws yog Ami‑ee huv lub moos Launtenpa tug tub, hab Npaxilai kws yog tuabneeg Kile‑a nyob huv lub moos Laukeli,
puab coj tej txaaj pw tej phaaj tej laujkaub aav, hab tej mog tej qeb tej moov tej qeb kib tej taum laag taum pauv,

hab zwb ntaab hab kua mig nyeem hab tej yaaj hab tej thooj nyuj mig nkoog tuaj pub rua Tavi hab nwg cov tuabneeg noj. Puab has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntawd tshaib hab tsaug leeg heev hab nqhes dej rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.”
Tavi txawm txheeb cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg moog hab tsaa kuas muaj thawj kaav ib txheeb leej hab kaav ib puas leej.

Tavi xaa nwg cov tub rog tawm moog ua peb paab, Yau‑a kaav ib paab, Anpisai kws yog Xeluya tug tub kaav ib paab hab Ithai kws yog tuabneeg Ka kaav ib paab. Vaajntxwv has rua nwg cov tub rog tas, “Kuv yuav nrug mej moog hab.”

Tassws puab has tas, “Koj tsw xob moog. Yog peb yuav tswv, yeeb ncuab yuav tsw quav ntsej peb. Yog peb tuag ib nraab lawm, los puab yeej yuav tsw quav ntsej peb. Tassws koj muaj nqes npaum le peb ib vaam leej. Koj nyob huv lub moos xaa tuabneeg tuaj paab peb xwb mas zoo dua.”

Vaajntxwv has rua puab tas, “Mej pum zoo le caag kuv yuav ua lawv le ntawd.” Vaajntxwv txhad sawv ntsug ntawm rooj loog ib saab saib thaus cov tub rog suavdawg tawm tuaj moog ua tej paab ib puas leej tej paab ib txheeb leej.

Vaajntxwv has rua Yau‑a hab Anpisai hab Ithai tas, “Saib rua sau kuv es tsw xob ua nyaav rua tug tub hluas Axaloo hov.” Thaus vaajntxwv has txug Axaloo le nuav rua cov thawj rog suavdawg, mas cov tub rog suavdawg kuj puavleej nov.
Cov tub rog txawm tawm moog ua rog rua cov Yixayee, puab sws ntaus sws tua rua huv haav zoov Efa‑i.
Cov Yixayee kuj swb Tavi cov tub rog, mas nub hov muaj tuabneeg raug tua tuag coob kawg, tuag ob vaam leej rua hov ntawd.
Kev ua rog nthuav daav moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws ntawd. Nub ntawd haav zoov noj tuabneeg coob dua nav ntaaj noj.

Mas Axaloo ca le ntswb nthaav Tavi cov tub rog. Axaloo caij rawv luj txwv, mas thaus luj txwv dha moog rua huv qaab tug ntoo qheb kws ntxhuv ntxhuv, Axaloo lub taubhau txawm khuab nkaus rua huv tug ceg ntoo ceev ceev le. Thaus tug luj txwv kws nwg caij dha dhau lawm nwg txawm dai quas vag ib ntaa ntoo.
